job_title: Two Assistant Professors in Geometric and Topological aspects of Data and Algorithms
job_desc: Are you a researcher in mathematics  Are you interested in geometry  topology  data science and algorithms  Please apply at Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam  VU   Location  Amsterdam FTE  0 8   1 Job description We are seeking a new colleague who is passionate about scientific research and education  Our department is looking for mathematicians with a proven expertise in geometric and topological aspects of data and algorithms  This topic can be interpreted in a wide sense  we are interested in analytical  statistical  probabilistic and combinatorial ideas to deepen our understanding of the relation between geometric and topological ideas on the one hand  and data science and its algorithms on the other hand  Concrete subject fields include stochastic geometry  topological  methods in  data analysis  geometric aspects of statistical learning  reconstruction of manifolds from data  equivariant deep neural networks  and applications of these  Other combinations of geometry topology and data algorithms are also a possibility   In this position  you develop their own research line  The position of Assistant Professor is initially a tenure track position for five years  After four years  based on transparent criteria  we will take a decision on the tenure  The preferred starting date is on or before September 1  2022   Applications from all groups currently under represented in academic posts are particularly encouraged  We are working to improve the present gender balance within the department  and particularly welcome applications from women Your duties you develop a research line in the broad area covering geometric and topological aspects of data and algorithms you complement existing research activities in the department you contribute to the teaching of the department  at both the undergraduate and graduate level you show academic leadership  nationally and internationally you participate in departmental activities and tasks  including writing grant proposals Requirements you have a PhD in mathematics  for example in the fields mentioned above  with a few years of postdoctoral experience you have a strong research record  as witnessed by excellent publications  original research projects  and an international network you are an inspiring lecturer you have good communication and execution skills you are fluent in English you have a basic teaching qualification   BKO    as required by Dutch universities  or equivalent  If not  you are willing to obtain this qualification What are we offering  A challenging position in a socially involved organisation  Based on full time employment  and depending on experience  the gross monthly salary ranges from  3807 to  5922 in accordance with Dutch academic salary scales 11  or 12  The job profile  Assistant professor or  Universitair docent   is based on the Dutch university job ranking system and the position is available for 0 8 1 0 FTE  For exceptional  experienced candidates an appointment as associate professor is a possibility   The appointment will initially be for 5 years  tenure track   After a satisfactory evaluation of the initial appointment  the contract will be extended indefinitely  Additionally  Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam offers excellent fringe benefits and various schemes and regulations to promote a good work life balance  such as  a maximum of 41 days of annual leave based on full time employment 8  holiday allowance and 8 3  end of year bonus contribution to commuting expenses good paid parental leave scheme child daycare facilities available on campusAbout Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam The ambition of Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is clear  to contribute to a better world through outstanding education and ground breaking research  We strive to be a university where personal development and commitment to society play a leading role  A university where people from different disciplines and backgrounds collaborate to achieve innovations and to generate new knowledge  Our teaching and research encompass the entire spectrum of academic endeavor   from the humanities  the social sciences and the natural sciences through to the life sciences and the medical sciences   Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam is home to more than 26 000 students  We employ over 4 600 individuals  The VU campus is easily accessible and located in the heart of Amsterdam s Zuidas district  a truly inspiring environment for teaching and research  Diversity  We are an inclusive university community  Diversity is one of our most important values  We believe that engaging in international activities and welcoming students and staff from a wide variety of backgrounds enhances the quality of our education and research  We are always looking for people who can enrich our world with their own unique perspectives and experiences  The Faculty of Science  The Faculty of Science inspires researchers and students to find sustainable solutions for complex societal issues  From forest fires to big data  from obesity to medicines and from molecules to the moon  our teaching and research programmes cover the full spectrum of the natural sciences  We share knowledge and experience with leading research institutes and industries  both here in the Netherlands and abroad   Working at the Faculty of Science means working with students  PhD candidates and researchers  all with a clear focus on their field and a broad view of the world  We employ more than 1 250 staff members  and we are home to around 6 000 students The Department of Mathematics  The Department of Mathematics strives for excellence in research  The department balances pure mathematical research with mathematical research motivated by applications  Researchers in the department are on one hand active at a fundamental and theoretical level  and  on the other hand  work on applications with links to business  the sciences  and societal issues  The department has a strong international research staff with expertise in dynamical systems  geometry and algebra  as well as in stochastics  statistics  data analytics  probability    The department offers bachelor and master programmes in mathematics and in business analytics  In addition  the department provides mathematics courses for other programmes of the Faculty of Science  for programmes of other faculties in the university  and for the Amsterdam University College  Application Are you interested in this position  Please apply via the application button by 1 April 2022 and upload  a cover letter in which you describe your abilities and motivation  a research statement  a brief teaching statement  a curriculum vitae  a publication list  as well as the contact details of three potential referees Applications received by e mail will not be processed  Vacancy questions  If you have any questions regarding this vacancy  please contact   Name  Bob Rink  Position  Professor of Mathematics  E mail  b w rink vu nl

job_desc: The role  We are challenging how live sport and entertainment is delivered and consumed   From the world s biggest sporting events  to the best local sport  to award winning original programming   our audiences enjoy a 24 7 offering of the best live and non live content across the ELEVEN Group  At a time of significant growth for our company and in continuing to deliver industry changing developments  we want you to help provide world class entertainment to the global fan community by strengthening ELEVEN s global sports platform and live streaming technology  We re now looking for a thoughtful and open minded Data Analyst  Sitting in the marketing team  you ll drive how data is leveraged in solving business problems within our cross functional teams  which comprise staff from across our functions and regions  You ll help consult with these stakeholders in defining what data is critical for our success  help set relevant success metrics  and shape our future revenue growth through data insights and effectively communicating possible solutions  Together with the Senior Marketing and Communications Manager  you ll help manage stakeholders based on their experience by prioritising business impact  efficiently adapting to business needs  and managing expectations accordingly  You ll also use your deep practical understanding of the data  workflows  methods  and tooling to autonomously drive dashboarding  analysis and reporting within your scope  At ELEVEN we re committed to hiring the person who we believe is the strongest candidate for the position  However  research indicates that women frequently only apply for roles where they believe they satisfy 100  of the role requirements  We don t want anyone to feel discouraged in applying for any of our vacancies  so if you believe you meet 60  or more of the criteria  we definitely encourage you to apply  What you ll do  Support the design of key metrics that quantify the success of our initiatives Organise and present your findings in a meaningful way to make sure your stakeholders are able to make the right decision Build dashboards that help internal and external stakeholders understand the performance of their business segment  and identify action points Design and implement decision making tools that enable data driven decision making Support our teams in planning and forecasting with automated reporting Work across our teams to build a joined up view of our customer lifecycles Be the  go to  data person across our teams for questions related to commercial and campaign performance  customer behaviour  and more Monitor data and information management processes to ensure data quality and consistency You are already a great candidate if you have   2 3 years of generating insights from large and complex digital data sets Deep familiarity with analytical and visualisation tools including SQL  Google Big Query  Google Analytics  Google Search Console  Firebase  Google Data Studio  and Google Tag Manager  Any experience with additional tools such as Youbora  Tableau  or Qlik is a bonus  The ability to deliver and communicate insights and reporting to commercial  technology  and product team audiences as well as external stakeholders Familiarity with measuring incrementality via the use of benchmarks  control groups  and statistical modelling Basic data science experience including modelling using R or Python And even better if you have   Worked with an international digital business whose revenue streams include subscriptions  pay per view  data av monetisation  and or sponsorship Proven experience with analytics across multiple digital platforms  including apps  smart TV  and games consoles Scripting experience in Google Sheets   Excel and creating workflow automations A good understanding of the global sports and media landscape Awareness and experience of working in an experimentation culture Opportunities you ll enjoy Be part of a company fundamentally transforming the live streaming landscape in sports and beyond on a global scale  Having the freedom to pitch  implement  and execute new ideas Flexibility over your holidays  If you want to work on Netherlands public holidays  that s fine   just take what suits you best from 33 days annual leave Flexibility where you work We have a company culture like no other  About ELEVEN ELEVEN is a global network of LIVE and non live sport and entertainment content   from the world s biggest sports events to the best longtail sport  to award winning original programming   The state of the art technology available via our newly launched global sports platform ELEVENSPORTS com  previously MyCujoo tv   which allows anyone to stream from a device as simple as a mobile phone  revolutionised football broadcasting  Our crazy idea to transform every single match into a live broadcast became the world s largest live football streaming platform  With an initial focus on niche premium and longtail sports  our ambitions are now even bigger   In 2020 we also delivered our newest product  MyCujoo Live Services  MCLS   a highly scalable live streaming solution built on the tech stack powering ELEVENSPORTS com  Developed for rights owners in sports and beyond  MCLS equips content creators with the technology and tools to provide their fans with the most powerful  authentic  and engaging live streaming experiences

At TripActions   It s all about the user  All of them   We re passionate about providing a seamless one stop experience for business travelers  no matter how they travel  where they stay  or where they re going   As a Data Analyst  you will be part of a fast growing Data team based from the EMEA Headquarters located in Amsterdam  We work in a dynamic environment  where we embrace moving quickly and work with the latest techstack and learning is part of the job  You will be working with a variety of stakeholders across the whole organisation ranging from our core travel product  next level expense management and finance and shape business decisions and our future product   The ideal candidate will be extremely curious  have a strong background in statistics and be obsessed with results  We take great pride in our diversity of backgrounds  cultures  and perspectives and we strongly believe this is helping us to grow as a successful and impactful team  To learn more about our team  you can watch this recent talk on the types of problems we work on and this one on how we work together as a group   RESPONSIBILITIES Support and advise the business with ad hoc analytics as well as applying statistical techniques to create insights and discover new business opportunities Enable and support the business regarding the development and use of data analysis and reporting by  building reporting grade data sources in our BI environment and translating those data sources into meaningful dashboards and reports for easy business use Provide business expertise and guidance  consultative partnership  on how to apply leverage data analytics and reporting within business operations Create and deliver documentation and training on reporting and BI tools for business users to enable self service on company data QUALIFICATIONS Masters in mathematics  statistics  computer science  information science  or related technical field 3  years of work experience in Data Analysis Experienced in SQL  experience with dbt is highly desirable  Experienced in BI tooling like Tableau  Looker  etc Demonstrated ability to translate business information needs into technical requirements and functional code reporting Demonstrated knowledge of standard statistical techniques like significance testing  regression modeling  etc Familiar with commonly used data technical tools like  R  Python Git Excellent communication and stakeholder relationship skills and a strong team player

job_desc: Machine learning engineers first and foremost sit at the intersection of software engineering  data science  and DevOps  You work together with data scientists and engineers in a team to build production ready  scalable machine learning systems   About us  Xccelerated is an initiative within the Xebia Group  accelerating growth of Data  Cloud   AI competence  Our 13 month advanced training programs integrate hands on learning and skill development with working at one of our partner companies  It is an intense learning journey for people who have proven their potential and are ready for the next step in their career   Working as a ML Engineer through Xccelerated  what is that like  Every ML engineer kicks off with two full time weeks of hands on bootcamp training  This intensive training focuses on writing deployable code with Python  containerization  data processing at large scale with Apache Spark and Kafka  and cloud fundamentals  Participants learn through classroom lectures  short assignments  hackathons and collaborative project assignments  Our ML Engineering Lead chooses the best training approach for the topic  depending on your needs   After these 2 kick off weeks  you ll work four days a week at the location of one of our partner organizations and one day a week at the Xccelerated office on remote   which involves ongoing training and project support from our technical leads  At the end of your first year  you get the opportunity to join the partner organization directly   The role itself  As a ML Engineer you will work together with other medior  and senior team members on challenging projects for our clients  In these projects you will work on data science   ML related topics  such as predictive software solutions  fraud detection or data engineering challenges such as building data pipelines  developing on cloud architectures and productionizing machine learning models   Besides this  you like big data tools and programming frameworks to ensure that the raw data gathered from data pipelines are used to build production ready scalable applications driven by data and AI  Who are you  You have   A technical bachelor s or master s degree  e g  computer science  informatics  artificial intelligence  software engineering  2 5 years of work experience as a ML Engineer or Data scientist Statistical knowledge  but are mainly experienced with end to end systems and able to run  deploy and monitor them  Preferably experience with the entire data pipeline  from data storage to model development  Knowledge of open source technologies like Spark  Kafka  Airflow and Kubernetes Good communication skills What we offer  Good salary 25 vacation days Kick off with 2 full time weeks of hands on bootcamp training Technical trainings   Innovation days  every week  Challenging assignments Company laptop  Macbook  Lunches  amazing coffee and snack bar Flexibility in working from home   at the office Working at one of our partner companies  e g  Heineken  ING  Randstad Group  FedEx  Vattenfall  Lely  Interested  We d love to meet you   Please get in touch  Contact Samantha Alves Goncalves at sgoncalves xccelerated io or by phone at 0613889770  https   www xccelerated io

Data Traineeship Focusgebied Data   Logistiek   Techniek Locatie Heel Nederland Dagelijks vervoert Arriva 500 000 reizigers naar hun bestemming  Hier gaat een complex logistiek proces achter schuil  waar tevens een grote hoeveelheid waardevolle data achter vandaan komt  Er liggen volop kansen om deze schatten aan informatie nog meer te benutten  data boven het oppervlak te krijgen en trends te ontdekken  Als data science trainee is het aan jou om haarscherpe analyses te maken en voorspelmodellen te ontwikkelen  waarop het management zichtbaar anticipeert en toekomstige beslissingen op baseert  Natuurlijk verwachten we niet van jou dat je al op je eerste dag een grootheid bent in data science  Je hebt wel een sterke drang om je zowel professioneel als persoonlijk te ontwikkelen  Zo kun jij het verschil maken  het vakgebied verder brengen en eraan bijdragen dat Arriva als bedrijf nog meer data gedreven gaat werken  Zowel op ons hoofdkantoor  in de 5 regio s als binnen Assetmanagement liggen complexe vraagstukken waar jij je tanden in mag zetten  Begeleiding en Training Naast je manager als eerste aanspreekpunt in de business  word je gekoppeld aan een personal coach  een buddy en een mentor  Jouw coach ondersteunt jou in je persoonlijke  en loopbaanontwikkeling en helpt je bij het opstellen van je persoonlijk ontwikkelplan  POP   Je buddy  ex trainee  maakt je wegwijs in de organisatie  Een mentor is een collega met een senior functie die bij kan dragen aan jouw professionele ontwikkeling  Bovendien biedt Arriva georganiseerde trainingen met andere trainees  word je lid van de Graduate Club en Young Arriva  Programma opzet Het Traineeship is opgedeeld in drie blokken waar je inhoudelijk de diepte in kunt  Opleiding en ontwikkeling  De eerste 2 maanden van jouw traineeship staan in het teken van opleiding en ontwikkeling  Je maakt kennis met de techniek achter de data en je leert de ins en outs van de applicatie Hastus  Daarnaast volg je een cursus Power BI en andere analysetools  aangevuld met extra DAX training en programmeren met Python  afhankelijk van kennisniveau bij onboarding   En je loopt mee met onze BI analisten binnen Datawarehouse  Aan de hand van concrete opdrachten uit de praktijk werk je in onze self service omgeving en ga je aan de slag met het bouwen van dashboards en maken van analyses Bouwen  voorspel modellen en toepassen econometrische analyses  je draagt dagelijks bij aan het realiseren van een zero emissie exploitatie van het openbaar vervoer  komt tot een optimalisatie van complexe vervoersstromen of een kostenbesparing  Denk daarbij ook aan het maken van commerciële analyses  gebruikersdata van de nieuwe app  Glimble  t b v  de verdere uitrol van Mobility as a Service Projectmatig werken  je werkt mee in onze strategische programma s  reizigers terug in het OV  Maatschappelijk Verantwoord Ondernemen en  wendbaarheid  Kortom  een diversiteit aan werkplekken binnen een innovatieve   inter nationale logistieke omgeving  Op deze manier krijg je een goed beeld van de organisatie en ervaar je in de praktijk welke functie het beste bij je past  Je zult bovendien merken dat Arriva een bedrijf is waar de lijnen kort zijn en er ruimte is voor ontwikkeling en vernieuwing  Doorloop je het Traineeship met succes  dan kun je een vaste aanstelling krijgen voor bijvoorbeeld de functie van data scientist  vervoerkundig analist of commercieel analist  Wat biedt ArrivaIntensieve Begeleiding  Coaching  Mentoring  Buddyschap en Training Marktconform As a Data Scientist  you are able to understand specific questions from our customers and answer them with data driven analyses  In this role  you are responsible for gathering the right information  formulating working hypotheses and testing these in order to solve problems step by step  In addition  you are able to communicate the analysical steps  outcomes and impact in a clear way to both team members and  external  stakeholders  Similarly  you will be responsible for implementing and possibly automating these steps and their integration into our clients  data systems   Responsibilities Understanding and solving challenging business issues using data in a variety of customer segments  Implementing and integrating solutions and applications in various system landscapes  Maintaining contacts with stakeholders and informing them adequately and transparently about outcomes  progress or setbacks  Training and coaching business consultants and junior team members  Building and maintaining a relevant network at existing and new customers  Valcon core values Can do Together Curiosity Integrity Joy We offer An energetic  ambitious and international environment with a great working atmosphere  An environment with significant autonomy and responsibility  A steep learning curve and structured coaching from your own mentor  A thriving community  active in both business and social events  Market relevant employment package  salary  benefits fund  bonus  lease car or mobility allowance and laptop   Apply today  Experience A completed technical university degree or PhD  Minimum of 2 years work experience as a Data Scientist  or as a Business Consultant with experience in data related issues Strong team player with good communication skills  Curious and self critical with strong analytical skills  Experience with analysis and programming of business issues and solutions  in e g  Python  R  C C    SQL   You are fluent in Dutch and English Location The Netherlands

Cloud Data Analyst As a Data Analyst at CTS you will be at the forefront of cloud technology  using your skills in a varied and evolving consulting role  You will solve complex customer facing challenges  helping diverse organisations to create and modernise data analytics platforms as they move to the cloud  You ll analyse and define your customers  requirements  and then manage the end to end execution process  You ll liaise with multiple stakeholders to ensure the timely delivery of appropriate outputs  in accordance with project plans and deadlines  Exposure to a wide variety of technologies and software is a given  and you ll be expected to investigate the use of new technologies as they become available  You ll understand the value of our long relationship with Google  and will help to grow and promote our data analytics capabilities within their teams  Please Note  Experience with  Looker  is highly desirable for this role  What you ll do Strong data processing experience and understanding of developing against common database technologies  such as MS SQL  PostgreSQL  MySQL  etc  Comprehensive problem solving skills and proven ability to apply creative and innovative thinking in order to identify and support the resolution of data quality and integrity issues  Understanding of developing visualisations and reports using BI solutions  such as Looker  Google Data Studio  Tableau  PowerBI  etc  Confident in presenting findings in an effective  structured and actionable way to a wide set of audiences with varying levels of understanding Hold the Looker Certified LookML Developer certification or have equivalent Looker experience Desirable Skills Exposure to data modelling   data science methodologies is a bonus  Prior experience working in a customer facing role  Experience working in an Agile team  understanding of project management methods  disciplines and project lifecycles  Location  This role can be based from any of our offices in Manchester  Edinburgh  Utrecht  or it can be fully remote based  Those who choose to work remotely might be required to travel to customer sites and to CTS offices for specific meetings or events  Travel expenses will be charged back to the business  What you ll get  In addition to the competitive salary  you ll get private health insurance and company contributed pensions as standard You ll be invited to the bi annual international company  kick off  conferences  which are a great chance to meet your colleagues that you don t see everyday  Diversity   Inclusion  Diversity   Inclusion  At CTS  we look after each other and support everyone on our team  We re proud of our people centred culture  our diversity brings us innovation and our commitment to inclusion drives us forward  If you share these values and would be interested in joining one of our teams  get in touch today  You can find out more at https   careers cts co pages o    About Us  CTS is the largest dedicated Google Cloud practice in Europe and one of the world s leading cloud transformation experts  We offer a unique full stack Google Cloud solution for businesses  encompassing cloud migration  transformative working and IT infrastructure  through to machine learning  big data and app development  We have a brilliant team of more than 200 people in offices in Manchester  Edinburgh   Utrecht as well as across our globally remote workforce  But we re still growing  and that means we need more brilliant people who share our ambition to join our team

experiences and age  The atmosphere is lively and informal  and the environment is safe  Your colleagues are really passioned to bring data under governance to make it easier to use data  Focus is to management puzzles head on  and solving them  Next to your day to day work  there is room to design  create and implement new processes especially when you are the one who is suggesting the change for the better   The team you become part of is in constant collaboration with all business lines  international branches and subsidiaries of the bank  We all work together at the frontier of the largest data revolution in the banking industry and with the core value assets of the organization   Position  As our Enterprise Data Governance Advisor  you help realise the delivery of the ABN AMRO strategy What do you do as a Data Analyst   As a Data Analyst you will play a big part in our Vion Business Analytics Competence Center  VBACC   Vion aims to become a data driven organization  The further development of a Vion wide Azure data platform is a key step in doing so  You will act as the bridge between the business stakeholders and the development team  Data engineers  Data modelers  Front end specialists  You will work in an Agile environment where you discuss requirements with business stakeholders  translate them into solution designs  plan the deliverables  and work as part of the development team towards a successful result  You will perform exploratory data analysis  identify and perform data quality checks  and are able to communicate findings clearly to the relevant stakeholders in the organization  Top 100 food company Every day 100 million consumers worldwide eat a meal with a little bit of Vion  This quantity comes with a big responsibility  At Vion we work passionately every day on the global food challenge  feeding 9 billion people in 2050  How can you contribute to this  The main responsibilities of the role can be described as follows  create the bridge between the business stakeholders and the development team  you gather requirements in the business for dashboards   reports and translate them into appropriate solution designs  you provide technical support to developers in the business and plan the deliverables  you will standardize  optimize and safeguard the Vion processes and dashboard functionalities like designs  scripting  presentation choices  test findings  availability and authorizations in collaboration with the other BI team members  the BI Product Owners  the MDM team and the department IM T  you will contribute to and guide the reporting questions and projects based on your BI knowledge and business affinity  you give solicited and unsolicited advice to the BI Product Owners and Management in the field of BI process improvements and data quality  you perform exploratory data analysis  you will identify and perform data validation and communicate the findings to the relevant stakeholders to improve business processes  What do we expect from you  you have a Master s degree in IT or technical subject  you have a minimum 3 years of experience with business analysis and data analysis  you have experience with the Agile and Scrum way of working and with Data warehousing and Business intelligence projects  knowledge of SQL  Python  Microsoft Azure  data visualization tools  strong communication skills both verbal and written and fluent in Dutch and English  strong analytical skills  you are able to structure and solve both conceptual and concrete problems  pro active  pragmatic  customer oriented  hands on mentality with regards to data  team player with good social skills  What can you expect from us  In our company you will have an attractive  versatile and permanent position  with proven suitability  within a leading international food company  with around 12 400 employees worldwide  innovative market concepts and clear core values  You will be able to influence and shape Vion s digital transition  We offer excellent working conditions and an inspiring environment to work in and an enthusiastic team  Are you interested   In case you think you are the right candidate to become our new colleague  or would you like to have more information about this position  Share your talents with us by sending your application letter and resume via the apply button below  For information ask Maartje Faassen via phone number  31 88 995 3555 For this position Vion is looking for direct contacts with potential candidates  we appreciate if companies do not offer their services in this

skills: sql, spark, tableau, r, python, aws, azure
job_desc: Do you get excited about analyzing data in game performances  Then continue reading   WHO WE AREAt Guerrilla  our Data Analytics team is an integral part of the game development process  Working closely with the stakeholders to create highest quality games  We are looking for a passionate and resourceful Data Scientist to identify opportunities to improve the player experience WHAT YOU WILL DOYou will develop and maintain standards for dashboards and reporting initiatives  This includes making sure data is visualized appropriately  creating consistent standards  and confirming that all data is accurate You will document requirements  develop  and deliver both written reports with analysis and charts on a dashboard You will work with engineering and QA to consistently monitor and improve our data You will perform statistical data analysis using data querying tools such as SQL and Spark You will synthesize disparate data  detect  and work around broken data  and investigate every possibility until you have a thorough solution You will analyze player gameplay and economy telemetry data to understand player behavior and suggest actions to improve the player experience You will work closely with development teams to provide insights into game quality  difficulty  and fun WHO YOU AREYou have a M S  in Mathematics  Machine Learning  Data Science  Statistics  Operations Research  Economics  or another quantitative field You have 3  years experience as a data scientist in the video games industry You Demonstrated understanding and passion of both contemporary video games and analytics best practices You have demonstrated skills in visualizing data  specifically utilizing Tableau You have experience with predictive modeling techniques and accomplished in the use of R or Python modules You possess a solid understanding of statistics  e g  statistical power analysis  significance testing  t tests  ANOVA You have experience in at least one cloud platform such as AWS  GCP  or Azure You have proven track record in data mining   analytics  building models with large  complex  and multi dimensional data sets Please note  this position is based in our studio in Amsterdam  Guerrilla offers comprehensive relocation and immigration support for candidates with experience in AAA games recruitment INTERESTED If you think you re up for the challenge  we d love to hear from you  You can apply by hitting the  apply now  button  Be sure to submit your CV and a Cover Motivation Letter   we like learning a bit about your background and your reasons for applying at Guerrilla Job Type  Full time

Wat je gaat doen Als Data specialist bij Arval In deze uitdagende functie maak je rapportages voor onze interne en externe klanten in zowel Nederland als Denemarken  Finland  Zweden en Noorwegen  Je vertaalt de wensen van klanten  leveranciers en directe collega s uit deze landen naar een mooi en duidelijk rapport dat de verwachtingen van de aanvrager overtreft  Hierbij is jouw kennis  ervaring en creativiteit essentieel  De vraagstukken voor de rapportages zijn zeer divers  waardoor je nieuwe kennis en ervaring opdoet over veel verschillende onderwerpen binnen de automotive   Bovendien help je mee om onze Business Intelligence tool OBI verder te ontwikkelen en uit te breiden  Hierdoor heb je ook regelmatig contact met onze IT afdeling  Daarnaast help je collega s met vragen over Excel en of Analytics verder met jouw kennis  Engels schrijven en spreken met onze collega s in de Nordics vormt geen probleem voor jou  In de startperiode geven wij jou op een enthousiaste manier de tijd en aandacht om ingewerkt te worden en kennis te maken met het team   De collega s op de afdeling analyse en advies zijn nauwkeurig  nieuwsgierig en kritisch en verwachten dat jij hen hierin kunt aanvullen en versterken   Je takenpakket bestaat o a  uit  Je automatiseert bestaande en nieuwe rapportage aanvragen in onze BI tool Analytics Je toetst nieuwe rapportage aanvragen op haalbaarheid en onderzoekt mogelijk bestaande alternatieven Je adviseert andere afdelingen in projecten waarbij data benodigd zijn Je ondersteunt en adviseert collega s met vragen over onze BI tool en Excel Je bouwt rapporten en dashboards in onze BI tool  Dit is waarom dit  n iets voor jou is Enthousiasme en kennis is belangrijker dan werkervaring  Je bent goed met Data  Engels spreken vormt geen enkele belemmering voor jou  Je vindt cijfers saai  Je bent niet zo kritisch  Een discussie voeren vind je spannend  Hier kom je terecht Je komt terecht in een afwisselend team dat bestaat uit tien collega s  De werkzaamheden zijn opgedeeld in drie vakgebieden  Client Reporting  Business Reporting en Data Intelligence  Je werkt het meeste samen met drie andere collega s op Business Reporting  Daarnaast heb je vanwege je rol ook veel contact met andere collega s binnen de organisatie  waaronder IT  Wat je krijgt Bij Arval kun je je een belangrijke bijdrage leveren aan de successen en ontwikkeling van de organisatie en de liefde voor Automotive mooi combineren  Omdat de beleving van de klant bij Arval voorop staat  maak je veel mensen blij met je werk  Dat geeft al veel voldoening  Ook parttime werken in deze rol is mogelijk   Behalve veel voldoening uit je werk  krijg je van ons ook  Salaris  Logisch  Voor deze functie ligt de range tussen   2 400 en   3 600  bij een 40 urige werkweek   Het exacte aanbod hangt af van je ervaring  leeftijd en kennisniveau  Vakantiegeld  8   Want het leven bestaat niet alleen uit werk  Bonus  een jaarlijkse winstbonus van  gemiddeld  één keer je maandsalaris   gemiddelde genomen over de afgelopen jaren  25 vakantiedagen   bij een 40 urige werkweek  Alleen als je belooft dat je weer terugkomt  Reiskosten  en thuiswerkvergoeding  omdat je per dag zélf kunt kiezen waar je werkt  Thuiswerkregeling  je kunt voor   726   artikelen bestellen die je helpen bij het inrichten van je thuiswerkplek  Flexibele uren  werken wanneer jij wilt werken  Op de plek die jou uitkomt   In overleg natuurlijk   Een premievrij pensioen  dat betekent dat Arval je hele pensioen betaalt  Je hoeft zelf niets bij te dragen  En dat scheelt serieus geld  Netto onkostenvergoeding  je krijgt geen telefoon van de zaak  maar wel een vergoeding voor bellen en internet van   37 50 per maand  Uitzicht op een vast contract  een beetje zekerheid is natuurlijk wel zo fijn  Leuke extra s  Zo kun je gratis sporten in Houten  Staat er altijd fris  sap en fruit klaar op kantoor en hebben we regelmatig leuke borrels of feestjes

 About Cognizant Quality Engineering   Assurance With more than 650 clients across industry verticals and a global footprint  Cognizant QE A is a recognized thought leader in quality assurance  With right  About role The Test Data Factory aims to pseudonymize our clients in bank sector production data so that they can be used for testing and analytical purposes  The data are delivered in a  factory like  approach for applications in the whole bank  Mainly focus on this moment is the payments a domain but the factory is expanding into other areas  such as risk   finance and lending   insurance  Test Data Factory uses leading edge technology and has been mentioned in the Economist and the Financieele Dagblad  Test Data Factory is part of the Radical Automation department  which provides various  test automation  services to DevOps teams within our client  Responsibilities  Test Data Analysis Pseudonymization of Test data Building Pseudonymization jobs with ETL tool Oracle   Good understanding and experience with bash scripting  Data migrations  and TDM projects  A good understanding of the concept of GDPR and identifying sensitive data  Experience in data profiling and setting up test data utilities  Experience with Linux Agile methodologies What you can expect A competitive salary based on your experience  Access to Udemy and Cognizant Academy digital Job Category  Science Job title  Head of Data Science Contract type  Full Time Experience  Executive Job Location  Zeist NL Job description  For our Data Science Department  we are looking for an experienced  communicative and proactive Head of Data Science  The Head of Data Science is accountable for the creation of new data sciences capabilities  statistics  statistical programming  machine learning  and predictive analytics  for the business by envisioning and executing strategies that will impact the business s performance by enabling informed decision making and by increasing the range of functional offerings to our clients   The Head of Data Science proactively works with business executives and departmental heads across the business in order to provide statistical designs and or advanced analytical data modelling solutions  The services provided by Data Science include the design and implementation of innovative and complex statistical designs  analytical models  and machine learning applications which utilize a blend of contemporary and traditional data sources including both structured and unstructured data elements  The Head of Data Science will report to the Chief Operating Officer   Tasks and responsibilities Forming  developing  and maintaining the Data Science team  Data Scientists  Statistician and Data Management  Improving commercial decision making through the incorporation of advanced analytical tools and methods into Julius Clinical processes Developing  implementing and validating custom statistical based advanced analytics that help answer complex business questions Provide or oversee the statistical and statistical programming contributions towards clinical trials and clinical studies Collaborating with the project team to identify and deploy the appropriate data assets  methodologies  and statistical techniques to answer complex business questions Supporting ongoing proposals  ad hoc requests and complex data investigations Contributing to the development of innovative methodologies and new offerings Job requirements Master s degree  with minimum of 12 years  experience  or PhD  with minimum of 10 years  experience  in Statistics  Mathematics or Economics Strong background in statistical models  advance analytics and programming in the pharmaceutical industry for regulated activities supporting drug or device development Excellent grasp of current and emerging statistical  analysis and programming techniques technologies Strong understanding of industry standards and regulations regarding statistics  e g  ICH E6 and E9  CDISC  FDA and EMEA guidances Deep understanding of the secondary data sources commonly used in the pharmaceutical industry  i e  script level  patient longitudinal  promotional  chart audits  etc   including the caveats and appropriate uses of each source Strong business knowledge and mindset to provide guidance on how data and analytical methods can be applied to answer business questions Strong communication skills to explain and resolve strategic issues  ability to communicate  verbal and written  technical and non technical information clearly to a diverse audience We offer  An open culture in an innovative and dynamic environment with inspiring colleagues and good working conditions  An environment where you have room to be creative  take initiative and have direct influence on the way we work   We are located in a beautiful monumental building  close to Slot Zeist  the Netherlands  However we work internationally and we offer the possibility of working home based from anywhere in the EU  as long as you are willing to visit the Dutch office approximately once per month   depending on COVID related travel restrictions of course   How to apply  Interested in this position  Send your CV and motivation to vacancies juliusclinical com If you have further questions you can contact Hans van Dijk  Chief Operating Officer at   31  0  6 5579 3729 or Ellen Hunink  HR Business Partner at   31  0  6 2116 2980

It s an exciting time to join us as we are reshaping our Asset Maintenance organization to become a real value driver for the business  In this 6 months assignment  with potential extension for 3 6 additional months  you will have business impact by providing high quality data analysis and support our Heads of Portfolio in maintenance data analysis to facilitate better decision making  We offer As Junior Data Analyst you will have the opportunity to gain insight into a truly global  large and complex  world class organization where you will be driving supporting improvements and working closely with experienced maintenance professionals  Within this complex working environment you will have a high degree of empowerment to take ownership and responsibility for developing insight into our maintenance data and support our Heads of Portfolio in implementing the new Global Asset Maintenance strategy and the new ways of working  You will work with diverse stakeholders and great colleagues in a large variety of positions and the role is enabling you to build a great network within APM Terminals globally  We offer an attractive career in an open and engaging working environment with a competitive compensation package  We provide opportunities for personal and professional growth and it is up to you to use this occasion to build an attractive career within a dynamic environment with future international career opportunities   At APM Terminals we value the diversity of our talent and will always strive to recruit the best person for the job   we value diversity in all its forms  including but not limited to  gender  age  nationality  race  sexual orientation  disability or religious beliefs  We are proud of our diversity and see it as a genuine source of strength for building high performing teams  Qualified applicants are encouraged to apply through the job portal and include a CV in English in their application  Internal applicants  please note that HR will request your staff card upon receipt of your application  Key responsibilities As Junior Data Analyst you will contribute to internal quality data assurance and accuracy improvements in terminals as well as  in conjunction with the business analyst  drive automation of Maintenance   Repair  M R  reporting to enable real time transparency of business and faster better informed decision making  Reporting directly to our Head of Portfolio  your role will be to analyze maintenance performance of terminals in scope to support our Heads of Portfolio and to facilitate decision making  You will be driving improvement of data accuracy and quality as well as compliance with reporting standards across terminals  You ll work closely with the Heads of Portfolio whom you will support in implementing a consistent way of working and continuous improvement in maintenance  reliability and performance   Other responsibilities include Analyze maintenance performance of terminals in scope to establish and understand trends for better monitoring and decision making  ensuring process enhancement and cost reductionDevelop internal and external benchmark of key maintenance performanceEnsure high quality data analysis and accurate performance reporting across portfolioBuild equipment Total Cost of Ownership and support on fleet performance and heat mapsSupport OPEX investment business cases and support to create base line and ambitions level for Asset Maintenance and fleet performance  LI POST We are looking for You hold or you are finishing an Engineering degree  preferably Mechanical or Electrical  or equivalent and you have maintenance analytics experience in an operational Asset Maintenance environment  You have expertise in information analysis or data modelling and strong analytical skills with the ability to visualize data  You have proficiency in data analytics  modelling and visualization tools  e g  MS Power BI  Tableau and ERwin    Your English communication skills are excellent both in speaking as well as in writing and you have strong communication skills with the ability to influence  Your computer skills are strong in standard and preferably in professional programs  i e  MS Office  EPR CMMS systems    Furthermore  you have attention to detail combined with a can do mentality being able to solve problems in a structured manner by generating  evaluating and implementing solutions  If you are looking for a positive change in career and if you are ready for this challenging new chapter  we look forward to receiving your application  At APM Terminals  we are a team of over 20 000 employees spread across more than 60 countries united by a passion to provide our expertise in port operations and container management services  By providing the expertise and port infrastructure essential to world trade  we actively support the advancement of the societies around us  enabling local economies to unlock their potential and build an even stronger global community  Working with a team of talented professionals you will get a chance to experience different cultures and make friends all over the world  You ll We are looking for a Research data management supporter  RDM  Do you want to work in an academic environment where you can use your own research experience  Do you understand the support needs of researchers and are you eager to help them find answers to the world s challenges related to agriculture  healthy food and living environment  Please read further  To strengthen our Research Support team at Wageningen University   Research   Library we are looking for 28 30 hours a week for a newResearch data management supporter As a research data management supporter you ll advise and support researchers on research data management  RDM  and the FAIR data principles  You ll facilitate and stimulate our researchers to bring RDM and FAIR data principles into practice  A perfect opportunity to start your career You will be working on the following tasks advise and support researchers on research data management and the adoption of FAIR data principles  ensure proper information provision and stimulating optimal use of the tools and services on RDM  evaluate data management plans for individual researchers and chair groups  provide RDM training  demo s and presentations for small and large groups of researchers and or PhD students  work in projects on new or extending support services for RDM  Wageningen University   Research offers excellent terms of employment  A few highlights from our Collective Labour Agreement Wageningen Research include  working hours that can be discussed and arranged so that they allow for the best possible work life balance  the option to accrue additional compensation hours by working more  up to 40 hours per week  sabbatical leave  study leave  and partially paid parental leave  there is a strong focus on vitality and you can make use of the sports facilities available on campus for a small fee  a fixed December bonus of 4   excellent pension scheme  In addition to these first rate employee benefits  you will of course receive a good salary  We offer  depending on your experience  a competitive gross salary of between   2 836   and   4 624   for a full time working week of 36 hours  in accordance with the CLA Wageningen Research  scale 10   This rol is for 28   30 hours a week  Wageningen University   Research encourages internal advancement opportunities and mobility with an internal recruitment policy  There are plenty of options for personal initiative in a learning environment  and we provide excellent training opportunities  We are offering a multi faceted position in an international environment with a pleasant and open working atmosphere  Wageningen University   Research The mission of Wageningen University and Research is  To explore the potential of nature to improve the quality of life   Under the banner Wageningen University   Research  Wageningen University and the specialised research institutes of the Wageningen Research Foundation have joined forces in contributing to finding solutions to important questions in the domain of healthy food and living environment  With its roughly 30 branches  6 800 employees and 12 900 students  Wageningen University   Research is one of the leading organisations in its domain  An integrated approach to problems and the cooperation between various disciplines are at the heart of Wageningen s unique approach  WUR has been named Best Employer in the Education category for 2019 2020  Read the 5 reasons why your future collaegues enjoy working at WUR and watch this video to get an idea of our green campus We will recruit for the vacancy communication skills  written and orally  in both Dutch and English  experience working in projects  affinity with the disciplines within WUR  For more information about this position  please contact  Research  WUR  employs a large number of people with very different backgrounds and qualities  who inspire and motivate each other  We want every talent to feel at home in our organisation and be Eneco eMobility groeit snel in Nederland  België en Duitsland  Het portfolio  de processen en het IT landschap veranderen continu om deze groei mogelijk te maken  We vertrouwen steeds meer op data om de verandering in de juiste richting mogelijk te maken en eMobility e asy te maken voor onze klanten  Wat je doet  Organiseer en analyseer gegevens en maak rapporten om  Geef het management inzicht in prestatie indicatoren  Geef inzicht in datakwaliteit en verbeteractiviteiten  Impactanalyses  bijv  getroffen klantgroepen  van voorgestelde wijzigingen uit te voeren  Het adviseren van de business over de relevantie van datakwaliteit  hoe te verbeteren en gebruik te maken van de gegenereerde data  Identificeren van procesverbeteringen op basis van data analyse  Het opzetten en onderhouden van een meetsysteem om gecreëerde waarde als gevolg van verandering te valideren  Opzetten en onderhouden van een meetsysteem om continu de bedrijfsgereedheid van eindgebruikers te meten  Voer ad hoc analyses uit in het geval van zakelijke kansen of problemen  Uw team  Het team van Eneco eMobility opereert internationaal en bestaat uit 175 medewerkers verspreid over drie landen  In Team Change Management werken 6 collega s in Nederland en 3 collega s in Duitsland  Functie eisen Wij hebben zeer gemotiveerde mensen in dienst die werken aan een bijzonder goed product  Daarom is niet iedereen fit  Controleer of je jezelf herkent in deze kenmerken   Je houdt ervan om de core business van eMobility te begrijpen en na te denken over hoe data inzichten de resultaten kunnen verhogen  Je bent gewend om de business proactief te adviseren over het maken van managementrapportages  Datakwaliteit is belangrijk voor u  Het opleiden van het bedrijf over het belang en het onderzoeken van de datakwaliteit is een typisch iets dat je op een vrijdagmiddag zou doen  Je bent 40 uur per week beschikbaar  Je spreekt  over de grens   Engels toch  Ook Duits  Perfect   Je hebt ervaring met PowerBI  Wij kiezen voor hybride werk  Dat betekent dat je twee dagen op kantoor  bij voorkeur Rotterdam  werkt  de plek waar je je collega s ontmoet  De andere dagen werk je vanuit huis  Zo flexibel  Uiteraard zorgen wij voor de juiste faciliteiten voor uw thuiswerkplek  We offer you  All terms and conditions of employment are well arranged  Nevertheless  we think it is also crucial to have additional focus on keeping energized as this can be expected from a charging company  The pace is high and eMobility is moving fast  Aspects as fun  personal development  appreciation  mental and physical fitness are equally or even more important than speed

Dit is de rol  Wat ga je doen  Boels is toe aan de volgende stap op het gebied van data  De organisatie wordt steeds meer data driven en we hebben iemand nodig die ons gaat helpen om  nog meer  inzichten te creëren en predictive analyses op te stellen  Wat ga jij dan precies doen als Data Scientist  Je gaat oa  data vertalen naar inzichten die als input dienen bij beslissingen voor de business  Het overgrote deel van je  interne  stakeholders bevindt zich in Sittard dus je kan snel schakelen  Je gaat  mee bouwen aan tools modellen waardoor de  interne  klant nog beter gebruik kan maken van zijn data  Jij bent  vanuit Sittard  bezig met het verzamelen met het bruikbaar maken van verzamelde data  Jij bent er  mede  voor verantwoordelijk dat er hoogwaardige oplossingen worden opgeleverd binnen afgestemde doorlooptijden  In deze rol werk je dan ook zelfstandig maar heb je veel contact met de rest van de Boels organisatie  Er gaan twee collega s  samen met jou  een start maken met het opzetten van een Data Science Center  Het is echt nog een green field waar jij je creativiteit volledig in kwijt kan  De Boels Familie Met ruim 7 000 collega s  750 filialen in 18 landen is het familiebedrijf Boels één van Europa s leiders in machine  en gereedschapsverhuur  Onze waarden beschrijven de manier waarop we werken  Ten eerste zijn we proactief  Samen krijgen wij zaken voor elkaar en zetten we die extra stap  Met onze toewijding leveren wij het beste resultaat  Daarnaast denken en werken we als één bedrijf  We delen onze ideeën en werkwijze  Zijn er problemen  Samen lossen wij ze op  Want samen vormen we één grote  oranje familie  Het oranje team in Sittard waar jij bij kan horen bestaat uit 9 collega s in het Analytics team  Jouw profiel Proactief  meedenken en communicatief sterk  jij bent het en dus pas je binnen ons oranje team  Om daarnaast ook als Data Scientist de beste te worden bij Boels  heb je  Minimaal drie jaar werkervaring als Data Scientist Aantoonbare kennis van Python 3 x HBO  WO denkniveau door opleiding of ervaring Ervaring met project  en stakeholdermanagement Jij bent iemand die het leuk vindt om binnen een jong team stappen te zetten  die niet bang is om inhoudelijke discussies aan te gaan en die mee wil denken over de professionalisering van de afdeling Wat we bieden Als je ons komt versterken als Data Scientist  dan doe je dat natuurlijk niet voor niets  Wij zijn blij met jouw kwaliteiten en daarom kun jij dit verwachten van Boels  Een salaris dat bij jouw kwaliteiten en ervaring past  tussen de   3 243   en   4 633   bruto op basis van een fulltime bruto maandsalaris  40 uur  en een aantrekkelijke bonusregeling 28 verlofdagen per jaar  en mogelijkheid om max  5 dagen bij te kopen  Reiskostenvergoeding richting Sittard en wanneer je gedeeltelijk thuiswerkt  ontvang je daar een aangepaste vergoeding voor Boels Rental investeert in jouw ontwikkeling zodat jouw kennis en vaardigheden up to date blijven Bij ons blijf je fit met het fietsplan en bedrijfsfitness Speciale Boels kortingen op o a  elektronica en weekendjes weg  collectieve verzekeringen en huren met forse personeelskorting  Solliciteren  Is deze vacature van Data Scientist in Sittard een schot in de roos  Solliciteer direct via de button  Toch nog een vraag  Mijn naam is Marielle en ik geef graag antwoord via WhatsApp op 06 28757591  Hoor ik snel wat van je

job_desc: Purpose   Overall Relevance for the Organization  Earlier this year  adidas decided to elevate the Data   Analytics function  moving from a tech service to a value oriented business function that actively and directly impacts adidas  P L The Data   Analytics function will include a Global Operations Advanced Analytics team  which will work hand in hand with the Global Operations organization on strategically relevant use cases that have the potential to deliver substantial value and redefine the way that the Global Operations business function operates  For example  the Global Operations Advanced Analytics team will build data science products to make supply chain faster  more efficient  and responsive through seamless demand   supply planning  optimized logistics and distribution  customized replenishment and automated workforce and production planning  The Data Scientists in the Global Operations Advanced Analytics team will support the development of data science methods for specific use cases across the full analytics lifecycle  from defining the business   data understanding to data preparation  modeling  evaluation  and deployment  Key Responsibilities Data science Support the development of data science methods for specific Global Operations use cases Continuously improve our methodologies and challenge the status quo  raising the standards for faster delivery Support improving and automating the data science platform and our machine learning pipeline to facilitate our data science activities and service use cases Data science network and storytelling Develop and nurture a data science network  both within and outside of adidas  to ensure that best practices and innovations are disseminated across the company Support presenting and promoting results and insights to adidas colleagues at all levels Stakeholder management Manage the relationships with the Global Operations project team  ensuring their views and requirements are captured Act as the ambassador for your use case  showcasing the key functionalities  driving adoption  and assuring operational excellence together with IT peersKey relationships Global Operations project teams SCM IT team Other teams within Data   Analytics  e g   Data assets  data platforms  data governance  market teams  Requisite Education and Experience   Minimum Qualifications Work experience University degree in the field of numeric statistical discipline or equivalent At least 4 years work experience  preferably in a data science or analytics environment Analytical experience in Supply chain planning and operations preferred Proven track record of working with senior stakeholders Hard skills Proficiency in data science methods  including supervised techniques  unsupervised techniques  recommender systems  Experience in developing and running simulation  optimization  and what if scenario planning tools to support decision making Proficiency in at least two of the standard data science programming languages  e g   Python  R  Java  Scala  Octave  Solid understanding of relational databases and NoSQL databases  Experience working with Databricks preferred Solid understanding of Machine Learning Operations  MLOps  required to scale and sustain use cases in a large and global corporation Familiarity with agile development methodology Soft skills Impeccable and to the point written and oral communication skills  English  Comfortable in presenting complex topics to stakeholders at various organizational levels Proven team player  BUT TO WIN  PHYSICAL POWER IS NOT ENOUGH  JUST LIKE ATHLETES OUR EMPLOYEES NEED MENTAL STRENGTH IN THEIR GAME  WE FOSTER THE ATHLETE S MINDSET THROUGH A SET OF BEHAVIORS THAT WE WANT TO ENABLE AND DEVELOP IN OUR PEOPLE AND THAT ARE AT THE CORE OF OUR UNIQUE COMPANY CULTURE   THE 3CS  CONFIDENCE  COLLABORATION AND CREATIVITY  CONFIDENCE allows athletes to make quick decisions on the field  to reach higher  For us at adidas confidence means acknowledging that we don t have all the answers  But we are willing to take risks  we try new things  And if we fail  then this is part of our learning   it helps us improve  COLLABORATION  Every elite athlete relies on partners  coaches  teammates  and nutritionists  We  too  know that we are stronger together  Winning as one team takes open and indien nodig   Waar ga je aan de slag In een unit met tientallen betrokken en vakkundige collega s  Je werkt op projectbasis voor gerenommeerde klanten in branches als Energie  Logistiek   Transport  Publieke Sector  Retail  Finance en Industrie  Professionaliteit en gezelligheid gaan hand in hand  Kenmerkend zijn thema s als diversiteit  kennisdeling  ondernemerschap en samenwerking  Zowel sociaal als vakinhoudelijk zijn er daarom veel contactmomenten en initiatieven  Zo helpen wij elkaar én klanten om klaar te zijn voor de data vraagstukken van morgen   HBO  Minimaal 2 jaar relevante werkervaring

Als Data Analist binnen Koninklijke Van Wijhe Verf vervul je een ondersteunende functie voor de afdeling Marketing  75   en de afdeling R D  25    Je voorziet collega s  binnen en buiten de afdelingen  van inzichten en stuurinformatie op basis van beschikbare en te verkrijgen data  De focus ligt op de informatie die nodig is om de commerciële én duurzame prestaties van de organisatie te verbeteren  Je maakt analyses op aanvraag en je zoekt op eigen initiatief naar nieuwe waardevolle inzichten  In de rol van Data Analist zorg je ervoor dat de Life Cycle Analyses database in stand wordt gehouden en verder wordt ontwikkeld  Koninklijke Van Wijhe Verf heeft in nauwe samenwerking met EcoChain stappen gezet om gedetailleerde informatie te genereren over de milieu footprint van onze producten  productie en verdere bedrijfsvoering  Verantwoordelijkheden Je gaat op zoek naar betekenisvolle patronen en correlaties in datasets Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het ontwikkelen van datamodellen Je bent verantwoordelijk voor het verkrijgen van inzichten in trends en resultaten door het combineren van gegevens uit verschillende systemen en externe data Je maakt analyses ten behoeve van het optimaliseren van het productportfolio Je creëert inzicht wat de impact is van Koninklijke Van Wijhe Verf op het klimaat  mens en milieu Je gaat op zoek naar nieuwe relevante databronnen en datasets binnen en buiten de organisatie Welke competenties en ervaring breng je mee Je hebt een HBO werk  en denkniveau Je hebt minimaal 3 jaar relevante werkervaring in een vergelijkbare functie Je hebt ervaring met data analyse en visualisatie Je hebt een goed probleemoplossend vermogen Je kunt goed luisteren en interpreteren Wat bieden wij Wij bieden je een functie in een dynamisch familiebedrijf  Hiernaast bieden wij je  Een aantrekkelijk en marktconform jaarsalaris    43 000     59 000  bruto  op basis van een fulltime salaris  inclusief 8  vakantietoeslag én 8  eindejaarsuitkering  29 vakantiedagen en 11 5 adv dagen Toegang tot online leerplatform van Goodhabitz  ontwikkeling  Personeelskorting op verf Wie zijn wij Ons bedrijf draagt al 4 generaties dezelfde naam  Door steeds te blijven vernieuwen zal die naam ook in de toekomst blijven bestaan  Wij zijn Koninklijke Van Wijhe Verf en zijn gevestigd in Zwolle  Als trots en onafhankelijk familiebedrijf met een rijke historie hebben wij ons in de loop van de jaren ontwikkeld van lokale verffabriek tot een nationaal en internationaal succesvolle organisatie op het gebied van verfsystemen en  toepassing  Deze koers wordt bepaald door een enorme passie voor eigenzinnige innovatie en eigentijdse duurzaamheid  wij zijn één van de weinige in onze branche die B Corp gecertificeerd zijn  Bij Koninklijke Van Wijhe Verf zijn de mensen betrokken en zijn de lijnen kort  Met grote merken als Wijzonol  Rebel Paints en Ralston leveren wij via professionele en retailkanalen aan professionele schilders en kwaliteitsbewuste consumenten  Wil je meer weten  Kan jij na het lezen van de vacature niet wachten om jouw talent  kennis en ervaring in te zetten voor het merk én het familiebedrijf  Solliciteer direct via de e mail aan Mireille van Deutekom  HR Manager via personeelszaken vanwijheverf com  Eerst nog meer weten  Bel of app Menno Beek  Marketing Manager  op 06   12 29 32 75  Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld

Werken aan grote procesverbeteringstrajecten  Als consultant ga je met je opdrachtgevers de grootste uitdagingen van deze tijd aan  Jij helpt onze klanten om niet alleen middels analyses waarde uit data te halen  maar gebruikt deze ook om processen beter in te richten  Zo bouw jij mee aan een duurzame digitale toekomst voor Nederland  Ben jij die enthousiaste consultant die daar blij van wordt en goed in ons ondernemende team past  Dan zijn wij opzoek naar jou   Jouw job in één alinea  Vind jij het ook belangrijk dat beslissingen worden genomen op basis van data en dat processen worden ingericht op een efficiënte manier  Dan is deze vacature voor jou bedoeld  In deze functie zal je klanten helpen bij het juist inrichten van hun organisatie samen met je team  Dit betekent dat je complexe processen inzichtelijk maakt en adviseert over het verbeterde gebruik van data om nog meer grip te krijgen op de organisatie  Dit doe je door bij te dragen aan het verkrijgen van relevante informatie over de as is processen middels de inzet van interviews  workshops en bijvoorbeeld process mining  Zo zorg je er uiteindelijk voor dat klanten meer inzicht krijgen in hun data en kernprocessen  Vervolgens help je bij het ontwerp van de to be processen en denk je mee over mogelijke verdere optimalisatie   Je thuisbasis bij Capgemini Invent  Je gaat aan de slag bij Capgemini Invent en werkt hier samen met collega s aan opdrachten voor grote  internationale  klanten uit verschillende sectoren  Denk aan retail  transport  overheid  de financiële of de industriële sector  We hebben allemaal een grote passie voor advies en technologie  maar vinden een fijne sfeer en plezier op de werkvloer  en daarbuiten  ook enorm belangrijk  daarom organiseren we regelmatig activiteiten  Het afgelopen jaar hebben we virtuele teamborrels gehad  team building activiteiten in de buitenlucht op 1 5 meter gehouden en regelmatig  virtuele  koffies gedronken  Normaal gesproken zijn team meetings bij collega s thuis en gaan we met elkaar op zeilweekend en wintersport  Bij promoties binnen het team gaan we  indoor  skydiven  Uiteraard is deelnemen altijd vrijblijvend  We snappen heel goed dat je soms ook even lekker tijd voor jezelf wilt of met familie en vrienden doorbrengt   Benefits Cold feet  Kennen we niet  Bij ons krijg je direct een vast contract  Get the future you want  Vanaf dag één krijg je volop mogelijkheden om jezelf te pionieren en je loopbaan vorm te geven  waaronder de mogelijkheid om verschillende trainingen te volgen  We bieden je grenzeloos vertrouwen én collegiale support  Een goed gevulde koffer met vakantiegeld én genoeg tijd  26 dagen  om het uit te geven  Een premievrij pensioen  zodat je ook op je oude dag nog met plezier aan Capgemini Invent terugdenkt  Werk flexibel in heel Nederland met onze connectiviteitsvergoeding  Je eerste levensbehoefte als professional  een laptop en een simkaart die je ook privé mag gebruiken  Altijd lekker onderweg met je leaseauto of NS businesscard  Of kies voor uitbetaling van je reiskostenvergoeding  En uiteraard een passend salaris  Hierover gaan we graag met je in gesprek  Persoonlijke ontwikkeling Natuurlijk gooien wij jou niet meteen in het diepe  Je start namelijk eerst met een intensief opleidingsprogramma van The Institute  In The Institute word je gedurende 2 maanden klaargestoomd voor het echte werk met allerlei verschillende typen consulting opdrachten waarbij je intensieve coaching en training ontvangt  Je werkt hierbij samen met uiteenlopende collega s binnen Invent  zodat je alvast een begin kunt maken aan je interne netwerk   Alles over onze arbeidsvoorwaarden Waarom past deze vacature bij jou   Wij vinden het allereerst belangrijk dat je goed in ons team past  Uit jouw ervaring en motivatie blijkt ondernemerschap  een brede interesse en ambitie  Je bent proactief  analytisch sterk en weet van aanpakken  Daarbij kan je snel schakelen  kom je met goede inzichten  en houd je altijd het belang van anderen in gedachte  Daarnaast heb je  Een afgeronde wo master  Al wat ervaring opgedaan bijvoorbeeld door middel van stages  een bijbaan of in het bestuur van een stichting of vereniging  En was dat in het buitenland  Dan is dat nog mooier  Naast sterke analytische vaardigheden  kun je complexe analyses en oplossingen in heldere taal kunnen communiceren richting stakeholders Kennis van Process Analytics tools en procesverbeteringsmethodieken  zoals Lean Six Sigma   Ook dat is mooi meegenomen  Een goede beheersing van de Nederlandse  minimaal B2  en Engelse taal  Werken bij Capgemini Invent Baanbrekende veranderingen zijn niet nieuw  Wel nieuw is de snelheid waarmee deze veranderingen zich voordoen  Toonaangevende bedrijven gedragen zich als levende organismen en zorgen ervoor dat zij zich constant aanpassen aan verandering  Als Capgemini Invent helpen wij organisaties om te innoveren en transformeren door strategie  data science  technologie en design te combineren  We zijn een werkgever met oog voor jou en het vizier op de toekomst  waarin duurzaamheid en diversiteit en inclusie de hoofdrollen spelen  Duurzaamheid Diversiteit en inclusie Meer informatie over Capgemini Invent vind je hier  Management Consulting Instagram
