Data Analist Wat gaan we goed en wat gaan we hard  Om deze reden zijn wij op zoek naar uitbreiding van ons data management team binnen de afdeling Business Technology  BT   Met meer dan 100 miljoen omzet per jaar en 40  E bike testcenters  is het tijd om onze ambities verder na te jagen  Dit jaar gaan we verdere stappen zetten om naast Nederlandse marktleider ook Europees marktleider te worden  Onder andere door verdere uitbreiding in Duitsland en België  we zijn niet te stoppen  Daarom kunnen we jou nu als geen ander gebruiken  Als Stella lopen we graag voorop  Niet alleen door mooie en kwalitatieve e bikes te maken  maar ook op het vlak van data en technologie  Data en met name het omzetten van data in informatie en inzichten voor de business wordt steeds belangrijker  Dus  ben jij data minded  Droom jij ervan inzichten te creëren in mooie én doeltreffende dashboards  Kom jij het beste tot je recht in een organisatie waar je kan pionieren en bouwen  Wil je onderdeel zijn van een zelf sturend team van data specialisten  En last but not least wil je werken met de laatste technologieën en een data platform wat volledig op Azure cloud draait  Stop dan met zoeken en kom ons snel groeiende team versterken  Als informatie data analist bij Stella maak je de vertaalslag vanuit de informatiebehoefte van de business naar de gewenste data inzichten en objecten  Je faciliteert de business met data inzichten en je weet hen enthousiast te maken om data gedreven beslissingen te maken o a  door ze mee te nemen in de mogelijkheden  Op basis van gemaakte analyses en behoeften die je ophaalt bij de business  bespreek je regelmatig met jouw BT  en data collega s de kansen om processen te verbeteren of om de datakwaliteit en integriteit te borgen  Het data platform draait volledig in de Azure cloud en naast het data platform bestaat het Stella business applicatie landschap uit het low code platform Mendix  SalesForce  Dynamics 365 F O en als iPaaS integratie platform Dell Boomi  Het data platform is IoT ready en dat is goed ook want Stella is met een groot IoT programma bezig om al onze fietsen zo snel mogelijk volledig connected te maken  wat een data bron wordt dat  Het data team waarin je komt te werken bestaat momenteel al uit 3 dataspecialisten met veel kennis en ervaring  Het data team is onderdeel van de afdeling Business Technology waar naast het data team de volgende teams onder vallen  infrastructuur  applicatiebeheer  programma projecten  Mendix   Dell Boomi expertise centrum en de Servicedesk  BT bestaat inmiddels uit ongeveer 25 enthousiaste professionals en we zijn nog steeds groeiende dus op zoek naar jou  Wij vragen  Minimaal een relevante afgeronde hbo opleiding  Minimaal 3 jaar ervaring in de data wereld als analist of een gelijksoortige functie Een analytische instelling en ervaring met complexe datavraagstukken Kennis en ervaring van de Microsoft BI stack waarbij kennis van cloud producten een pre is  SQL Server  Azure Synapse Analystics  ADF  Analysis Services  Power BI   Vaardigheid kennis van in het opstellen van ETL en het maken van SQL queries Ervaring met Agile Scrum manier van werken Goede beheersing van zowel de Nederlandse als Engelse taal in woord en geschrift  Duits geeft jou een streep je  voor op de rest  Karakter  Energiek en enthousiast  er moet veel gebeuren in een rap tempo in een korte tijd  Flexibel en georganiseerd  Je weet goed onderscheid te maken tussen de verschillende werkzaamheden  Ondernemersdrift voel je in de hele organisatie  dat vraagt van jou dat je vasthoudend bent op de momenten dat het moet  maar ook meebeweegt met de organisatie als dat kan  Proactief en ondernemend  Jij ziet kansen en pakt ze met twee handen aan  Behulpzaam en analytisch sterk  jij bent een trouble shooter in de organisatie en schakelt met veel verschillende afdelingen en type personen  Leergierig en zelfverzekerd  veel nieuwe onderwerpen om op te pakken en veel processen vragen om verbetering  Dé kans om hier over mee te denken en het uit te bouwen  Pragmatische doorzetter  jij weet van aanpakken en haalt resultaat ondanks dat het niet altijd gaat zoals het moet en weet op de juiste momenten een pragmatische aanpak te hanteren Ons aanbod  Een fulltime  32 40 uur  dienstverband en een jaarcontract met uitzicht op vast dienstverband  Een bruto maandsalaris naar opleiding en ervaring  Persoonlijke opleidingsmogelijkheden  24 vakantiedagen op jaarbasis  Vitaliteitsbonus te verdienen van 5 vakantiedagen  Verjaardag vrije middag  Laptop en mobiele telefoon  Pensioenopbouw bij PMT  Collectieve zorgverzekering bij Zilveren Kruis  Fikse korting op een Stella e bike  Gratis dagelijks vers fruit op de werkvloer en gezonde kantine  Véél gezelligheid  minstens 2 personeelsfeesten per jaar en veel aandacht voor mijlpalen  Daarnaast heeft Stella veel prijzen gewonnen voor haar e bikes  zijn we Retailer van het jaar geworden en zijn we door Indeed verkozen tot een van de aantrekkelijkste werkgevers van Nederland  Een referentieonderzoek maakt deel uit van de sollicitatieprocedure  Bij indiensttreding vragen wij om een VOG

This is going to be your job Within APG AM Operations the Master Data Management Team  MDM Team   sources  enriches  assures  and publishes Master Data via the MDM platform to ensure delivery of ready to use data to customers throughout APG AM  The MDM team continuously improves their processes to make them as efficient as possible and strives to be a leader in automation and the leveraging of the global company footprint  The team consists out of multiple data domains and is multi international  For one of the domains we are hiring a Data Service Officer  Your main responsibilities  Roll out of the business service model for our data vendors  Deliverables are providing a service report  highlighting the services delivered to APG AM in the past period   discussing this report with the vendor and if necessary  defining follow up actions  Part of the monitoring of the services of a data vendor is also translating the contract to the drivers that impact the monthly invoice  For each contract these cost drivers  aka key usage indicators  need to be established and reported internally  Responsible for the entire data vendor contract administration of the Operations department  not limited to the legal agreements but mainly focusing on related docs  such as policy docs  price schedules  service descriptions  service reports  Yearly review of existing contracts  defining the compliance and cost drivers and establish whether the actual usage of the data is in line with the terms and conditions  Set up of a cost model which makes the costs more transparent as part of management reporting  This is what you offer Have some affinity with the set up of financial models including an initial analysis of the different variables of the model as well a first build of a financial model  e g  in excel   Have sufficient basic consultancy skills  such as analyzing a problem  defining alternatives  preparing presentations  drafting memos etc  The candidate will be involved in multiple meetings with external parties and therefore should have relevant skills to attend service meetings with global service providers  Profile requirements Relevant HBO or academic study  A minimum of 2 5 years of relevant working experience is required  Knowledge of programming languages such as VBA  R or Python is a pre  Have a background in economics or international business  Important hereby is to have good insight in the functioning of the financial and money markets with a basic understanding of the different financial products as well as the related institutions and financial process  Be able to work in different teams  but at the same time show ample maturity to follow up on his own deliverables and involve support when needed  Good communication skills  Language skills  English  excellent  Proactive  result driven  analytical  team player  hands on  client and service oriented  Working under daily time pressure in a dynamic and changing environment is not a problem for you This is where you ll work We offer you a competitive maximum salary of   5 635 based on a 40 hours working week and attractive terms of employment with a focus on flexibility  A guaranteed year end bonus of 8 33  Ample attention to your vitality and personal development Hybrid working  at home and in one of our superb offices And of course a well organized pension  For pension provider APG  pensions are about people  life and how we live together  Through careful asset management  pension administration  communication and advice  APG wants to help build a decent future in which we share our well being and prosperity honestly and sustainably  For present and future generations  For today  tomorrow and beyond  APG is committed to serving 4 7 million people in the Netherlands  That explains the importance we attach to reflecting Dutch society  To that end  APG strives for an inclusive work environment in which everyone can be themselves and their unique qualities are embraced  Choosing APG means choosing a job in which you contribute to a bright future  Don t delay  apply today

career through the steep learning curve  Apart from learning on the job  there will be ample trainings to boost your core consulting and people skills through the Consultant Development Program  CDP   You will be assigned involved coaches  who will be there for you to provide you with guidance  Next to that  IG H offers you an inspiring office in Utrecht  an unparalleled good working atmosphere  and abundant parties  team activities and sporting events    The most beautiful thing about consulting is the diversity within the projects  IG H offers next to different clients  a variety in the types of assignments  One assignment could be very strategic  in which yououtline the direction of a company  Whereas another assignment could be focused on implementation  in which you are working together with the client to deliver concrete results   Peter Hardy  Manager  Why IG H   IG H is transforming leading companies across the Health  Retail and Finance sectors  Together with our world class technology partners  we help our clients move forward and stay relevant  With insightful advice  great design and unrivalled digital platforms  Our exceptional results come from successfully aligning people  business and technology  With over 300 talented colleagues on board  people who genuinely embrace change and challenges  we ve created a unique high daring  high caring culture  Attracting extraordinary people and inspiring them to push the boundaries for themselves and our clients  What you bring MSc degree At least 2 years of relevant work experience within a consulting  type  environment Analytical  inventive and practical Python and or R skills You have a top sport mentality  we are looking for talent that continuously wants to be better What we offer you Working at a Great Place to Work with a pleasant atmosphere and enthusiastic colleagues who support you  The chance to make a real contribution to the ongoing domestic and international growth of IG H  We offer a permanent  indefinite  contract right away  Excellent salary and working benefits  company car   good mobility scheme  Generous bonus scheme  25 holiday days with the possibility to take up more  The possibility to take a sabbatical after 3 years of employment  and more  which we would love to elaborate on  Now   are you excited   If this vacancy is right for you  then this is a great place to work with super happy employees and clients  NPS   60   On top of that  we re hitting double digit growth and have our sights firmly set on continued international expansion  We re still just embarking on this exciting adventure   For more information please contact one of our recruiters Jesse Albus jesse albus igh com 06 18745743  You can also apply directly via the apply button  Hope to job_title: Sr Analyst/Consultant, Real World Data Solutions
job_desc: At Certara  we accelerate medicines to patients by partnering with life science innovators  In the past 6 years  over 90  of companies that received new drug approvals by the FDA used our software or services  Our integrated and proprietary end to end platform with biosimulation  regulatory science  and market access solutions combined with our strong team of scientists and subject matter experts enable our clients to have  informed decision making   reduced clinical trial burden higher R D productivity improved patient outcomes   increased patient access to medicines accelerated regulatory approval Certara is a global team that fosters and nurtures a diverse and inclusive culture  We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer  The collective sum of our individual differences  life experiences  knowledge  innovation  self expression  and unique capabilities and talent represents a significant part of our culture  our reputation and our achievement  Together with our partners  we use biosimulation and technology enabled services to transform drug discovery and development across all therapeutic areas and innovative therapies  Job Overview  This is a great opportunity for an early career Epidemiologist Pharmaco Epidemiologist Public Health professional to join a team of highly skilled epidemiologists  statisticians  health economists and consultants  The successful candidate will work closely with other senior scientific staff within the company  This position will allow the Senior Analyst  Epidemiologist to deepen his her skills by writing protocols for observational studies using a variety of healthcare databases  primary and secondary data collection  as well as providing scientific and other technical input during conception  conduct and delivery of various research projects  Main tasks   responsibilities Support RWDS project teams and be accountable to the project manager director for those projects Summarize and synthesize a wide range of medical and statistical information  including disease specific and pharmaceutical product research Develop an understanding of Regulatory HTA requirements for RWE  at least in the European and or North American context Support development of study documents  eg  protocols  analysis plans  reports  posters  manuscripts  under guidance from scientific team members and project manager s Liaise and manage processes with ethics committees  application committees and other relevant stakeholders to support acquisition of data for studies Interpret and communicate the results of clinical observational studies  health economic models  cost effectiveness and budget impact  and statistical analyses Undertake primary and secondary research initiatives including the retrieval and analysis of data  competitive product pipeline information  epidemiology trends  etc  according to needs of the project Participates in production of reports  presentations and publications  Critically analyzes data  presents results and provides internal data analysis  both qualitative and quantitative  and provides strategic thinking with respect to interpretation of results Interact with and foster relationships with existing network of scientific clinical payer experts and data providers Liaise with other consultants assigned to the project to ensure quality delivery of the project Support senior personnel with activities required for business development from time to time Align with and work within the framework of SOPs for data governance with respect to projects led Required Qualifications   Experience Minimum of Master s Degree in Epidemiology  Public Health  Medicine or other related field At least 2 years relevant post graduate work experience preferred Required Skills Professional proficiency in English  written and spoken Experience designing writing protocol for database or other observational studies Ability to work both independently and as part of the team Ability to effectively prioritize and manage multiple tasks and projects OTHER INFORMATION  This position can be office based or work from home in the UK  EU  Canada or USA  Number of Employees Supervised  None Percentage of Travel Required  0 10  travel Certara bases all employment related decision on merit  taking into consideration qualifications  skills  achievement  and performance  We treat all applicants and employees without regard to personal characteristics such as race  color  ethnicity  religion  sex  sexual orientation  age  nationality  marital status  pregnancy  physical or mental condition  genetic information  military service  or other characteristic protected by law   LI HM  LI Remote 2199

Who You ll Work With The Privacy Team plays an important and dynamic role within McKinsey  and the work is diverse  interesting  and challenging  Working closely with McKinsey s Global Privacy Officer  other Privacy Team members  members of the Legal Department  and McKinsey s leaders and client service teams  you will help shape McKinsey s global approach to privacy and data risk management  including playing a key role in developing and maintaining McKinsey s strategic compliance  and governance activities  As a member of the Privacy Team  you will be expected to keep abreast of key developments in privacy law  regulation  technology  and best practices in Europe and other regions  and to provide direction as well as day to day operational support for McKinsey s business activities  The role can be based in Brussels  Amsterdam Düsseldorf  Munich  Madrid  Copenhagen or potentially other locations in the EU  EEA  Exceptional candidates based in other locations will be considered if experience  background  and fit are appropriate  What You ll Do In this position  you will focus on supporting and expanding McKinsey s global approach to privacy and data risk management  As a member of McKinsey s global privacy team  you will work closely and collaboratively with other members of the Legal Department and also colleagues across McKinsey  including those in Cybersecurity  Information Technology  Recruiting  Human Resources  Finance  and Client Relationship Management  Your scope will include leading or participating in complex and or cross functional privacy and data risk management projects for a global firm with a diverse and evolving range of business lines and internal functions  contributing to leadership and guidance to McKinsey in connection with the continued maturation of McKinsey s privacy program  and conducting or providing advice with regard to data protection impact assessments  Additionally  you will develop privacy guidance for McKinsey leadership in connection with important strategic opportunities and liaising and coordinating with other McKinsey colleagues to ensure that privacy and data risk management considerations are appropriately identified and addressed as part of new projects and initiatives  You will assist in the creation and review of privacy program governance and operational documentation  e g   policies  guidelines  templates  and FAQs   and review McKinsey s privacy program and performance on an ongoing basis to ensure compliance with law and continued maturation in a manner commensurate with business and strategic priorities  applicable law and industry best practices  This position will offer you the opportunity to review and negotiate contractual arrangements with clients  collaborators and vendors  as a resource and escalation point on privacy matters for colleagues across McKinsey  and develope privacy risk management resources and participating in training and awareness activities  Qualifications Qualification as a lawyer with 5  years of professional experience with one or more of a law firm  in house legal department  or organization with a privacy and data risk management focus 2  years of practical operational experience in privacy  preferably with global or multinational experience Excellent written and oral communications skills in English Strong background in information security and technology  including working collaboratively with technical experts in these areas will be considered favourably Other compliance and or legal experience in areas closely connected to privacy  e g   technology transactions  cybersecurity  or intellectual property  or in specific regulated industries  e g   healthcare or banking  will be considered favourably Additional practical  operational experience in data risk management  compliance  including GDPR compliance   cybersecurity  and data governance   as a lawyer or non lawyer   will be taken into consideration Privacy and data risk management credentials are preferred  e g   CIPP E or equivalent  Excellent team player with a keen ability to apply business and risk judgment on tight schedules Excellent interpersonal skills  including clear and effective writing and communication skills Excellent organizational skills  including the ability to handle high volume of work efficiently  recognize priorities  manage time effectively and meet deadlines Ability to work independently with moderate supervision in a decentralized  challenging and fast paced environment Inspiring team player who collaborates effectively within cross functional and fast paced team environment and proactively builds collective knowledge and capabilities Pragmatic problem solver who skilfully navigates challenging situations Highly effective communicator who translates complex laws and regulations into actionable advice Trusted advisor who demonstrates impeccable judgment and values and builds strong relationships across the organization

zelfs onaangeraakt onder het oppervlak verborgen  In ons traineeship Data Science leer je die informatieschatten vinden  opgraven en benutten  Als trainee ontdek jij de waarde van kwantitatieve informatie en leer jij hoe je belangrijke inzichten ontvouwt uit klant  en bedrijfsinformatie  Zo helpen al onze data professionals afdelingen en beleidsmakers binnen de financiële   overheid  en energiesector datagestuurd werken  Met als resultaat een scherpere focus op strategische bedrijfsdoelen en optimale dienstverlening richting klanten zoals jij en ik  Big data is een 21e eeuwse wetenschap op zich  die maar enkelen beheersen  Met ons traineeship Data Science word jij daar een van   Het ontwikkeltraject in het traineeship Data Science  Het traineeship Data Science bestaat uit drie belangrijke onderdelen  Kennismaking met House of Bèta  collega s en ons opleidingsaanbod tijdens de onboarding  Het beste Onboarding programma van Nederland doorlopen  Solliciteer nu en start met het Talent Pro onboardingsprogramma op bijvoorbeeld 4 maart of 1 april  Waardevolle ervaring in de praktijk via opdrachten bij onze klanten  Doorlopend opleidingen bij ons Brain Development Lab  waar de theoretische basis van jouw ontwikkeling gelegd en verbreed wordt Iedere consultant die bij House of Bèta start zal beginnen in de oriëntatiefase  De oriëntatiefase is een fase van ongeveer twee jaar waarin je de gelegenheid hebt te ontdekken waar je ambitie ligt en waarin jij je zou willen specialiseren  Ben jij er al zeker van dat je Data Scientist wil worden  Dat klinkt goed  maar je zal nog steeds uitgedaagd worden te onderzoeken wat er allemaal nog meer is  Om je hierin te helpen zal je aan de slag gaan bij verschillende opdrachtgever binnen en buiten de financiële dienstverlening en opleidingen doen zoals Excel  VBA  Agile Scrum  Python  SQL of zelfs Actuarieel Rekenaar   De opdrachten  Business Intelligence en werken met Big Data Je gaat als young professional gedetacheerd werken voor klanten in de financiële dienstverlening  zoals alle grote banken en verzekeraars in Nederland  Of je gaat aan de slag bij overheidsinstanties in de telecom  energiemarkt of transport  Tijdens het traineeship stomen we je klaar voor het bedrijfsleven  waarna jouw eigen groeipad je leidt naar mooie rollen als data analist  BI consultant of data scientist  Rollen waarin business intelligence en big data centraal staan  jij informatie om gaat zetten in kennis en kennis in passende acties bij jouw opdrachtgevers  In jouw route richting een carrière in data science bepalen jij en je People Manager het tempo  Hoe snel breng jij jouw skills en ervaring als data specialist naar een hoger level   Starten met een Data Science traject zal niet altijd beginnen met een Data gerelateerde opdracht  Het leren kennen van onze klanten binnen de financiële dienstverlening zal zeer belangrijk zijn  Starten met een operationele opdracht bij een bank  verzekeringsmaatschappij of pensioenfonds is wat je kan verwachten  Dat kan ook een servicefunctie zijn aan de telefoon   De opleidingen voor jou als Data Science trainee  Binnen het Traineeship Data Science is alles erop gericht je snel bekend te laten maken met de mogelijkheden binnen data science en business intelligence  Je begint met de basis  Tijdens de onboarding leer je de fijne kneepjes van dataverwerking in Excel en VBA  In het tweede jaar kies je met een stevig fundament van jouw opgedane kennis en praktijkervaring voor opleidingen en trainingen die passen bij jouw verdere ambities Introduction to the job Do you love designing  product  data solutions and playing a key role in the fundaments for Operational Excellence   Are you keen to work in a data driven environment within a high tech global enterprise  Are you challenged by working in such an environment and while doing so striving for the highest possible  data  quality and essentially making great business impact through that  If so  then this might be the right opportunity for you  Role and responsibilities ASML strives to become  best in class  in operational excellence  We as a department enable ASML to be in control of product master data  model  as the foundation for efficient business execution  at any point in time  As a Data Subject Matter Expert you are responsible for providing product data solutions that fit best with the requirements and ambitions from our business stakeholders  securing data quality trough adherence to the data framework  data governance and other data fundaments  You will contribute to product data improvements which are performed by multidisciplinary  project  teams that consist of multiple business stakeholders  within   outside Sourcing   Supply Chain  and IT   Key Areas of Responsibilities  providing product data solutions  solving structural product data issues within the business by applying problem solving skills and securing data quality  This includes  performing root cause analyses and defining product data improvement initiatives providing impact assessments  translating requirements into user stories  creating functional and technical specifications for the solution  incl  cleansing migration strategy when needed   creating   preparing product data quality reporting aligning with business stakeholders on required process changes  preparing and supporting end to end testing  contributing to the implementation of the data solution in the organization  e g  by preparing training creating   maintaining work instructions  procedures and product data quality solutions  2nd line support for operational issues   incidents  where other stakeholders from the data management community need help in root cause analysis and or issue resolution  responsible for continuously improving our way of working  applying performance management  problem solving methodology  and other tools that can support in continuous improvements  contributing to department s roadmapEducation and experience MS c degree in Information Technology  Industrial Engineering  or related fields 5  years relevant and proven experience Experience with  product  data quality management and its impact on business processes Experience with data architecture s  and understanding of data modeling  including knowledge on product data model Experience with performance management  metrics  KPI s and reporting  Experience with SAP  or ERP  applications  such as MM  MDG  BOIS BODS   ECM  is a pre Understanding how data governance is embedded within global enterprisesSkills Working at the cutting edge of tech  you ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve   and working together is the only way to do that  You won t work in a silo  Instead  you ll be part of a creative  dynamic work environment where you ll collaborate with supportive colleagues  There is always space for creative and unique points of view  You ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems  To thrive in this job  you ll need the following skills  Pro active attitude  drive for improvement Ability to structure and conduct analyses to generate insight and recommendations Excellent problem solving skills Well developed project management skills  focus on stakeholder management and influencing without power  Experience with Lean and Agile are a pre Result driven Drive and motivation to ensure successful delivery of complex initiatives Ability to leverage resources available to achieve goals Excellent professional communication in EnglishDiversity   Inclusion ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce  It is the policy of the company to recruit  hire  train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race  color  religion  sex  age  national origin  veteran status  disability  sexual orientation  or gender identity  We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company  Other information The Data Quality Expert role is part of the Data Quality Solutions team and part of the Master Data Management department  The department manages global product related data  enabling ASML to achieve high data quality leading to operational excellence by supporting time to profitability  It manages data governance boards for ASML s manufacturing  supply chain management  finance and procurement departments   The Master Data Management organization is an industry leading organization  responsible for ensuring material availability to ASML s factories and customers  Our DNA contains customer focus  concurrent engineering  virtual integration plus the ability to thrive in a volatile market  accelerate the supply chain and deliver creative solutions  Plans are made up to four years ahead while customer requirements and system bill of materials can change at any time  Any break in material availability can have an unacceptable impact for our customers  So  with all our highly talented  educated and motivated people  we must proactively identify and solve potential issues by working closely together with our technical departments and customers while actively managing an extensive supplier base  Check for more information our website www asml com Need to know more about applying for a job at ASML  Read our frequently asked questions

uit  Dat heeft impact  zeker op onze afdeling Meterdatamanagement  Het team Meterdatamanagement zorgt onder andere voor het verstrekken van meterdata van inmiddels 1 3 miljoen klanten met een slimme meter aan gemandateerde marktpartijen en interne afdelingen  De data uit de meter is essentieel om  zowel intern als extern  procesverbeteringen en kostenbesparing tot stand te brengen  En daar kom jij als data analist bij kijken   Je bent een belangrijke schakel in het realiseren van een functionerend meterpark  Voor het beheren hiervan hebben we diverse systemen en processen  Het beheren van visualiseert deze  Ook ben je de vraagbaak coach op de inhoudelijke materie voor de junior data analisten  Zo veel mogelijk functionerende slimme meters  ook dat is de energietransitie  Genoeg te doen Als Business en Data analist bij het ministerie van Infrastructuur en Waterstaat te Den Haag zorg je ervoor dat de inzet van data een belangrijke pijler is onder onze Nederlandse infrastructuur  Je combineert inhoud en strategie met uitvoerende adviestaken op het gebied van data analyses  Als Business en Data analist leg je de juiste verbinding tussen relevante databronnen en de bestaande databehoefte  Daarbij combineer jij jouw inzichten in het datalandschap met geavanceerde tools  Jij voert deze veelzijdige functie uit bij de afdeling Administratieve Organisatie en Interne Controle  in het team Managementinformatie  Dit team maakt onderdeel uit van de directie Financiën en Inkoop  Wat ga je doen als business en data analist  Als Business en Data analist draag je bij aan de doelstelling van onze directie om de bedrijfsvoering en beleidsdirecties te ondersteunen in datagericht werken binnen de vele besluitvormingsprocessen  De directie gaat vaker en sneller advies geven op basis van verschillende databronnen  Met een data gedreven benadering verhoogt de directie de advieskwaliteit  In jouw rol als business en data analist lever je een actieve bijdrage aan ambitieuze projecten en opdrachten  Jij creëert de voorwaarden om data gedreven te kunnen werken  Dat doe je vanuit de vraag binnen de afdeling  Jij zorgt ervoor dat er inzichten en sturingsinformatie in de dashboards geplaatst worden  die bijdragen aan deze advieskwaliteit  Je werkt daarbij nauw samen met collega s van het team Management informatie  Samen met jouw teamgenoten laat je ook een frisse wind waaien door de wereld van control en financiële verantwoording en op het gebied van de informatiehuishouding  Je draagt bij aan technologische innovatie binnen de Rijksoverheid  Als business en data analist speel je een essentiële rol bij het ontsluiten van informatie en innoveren van financiële en controlerende functies  Daarmee zet je de trend voor alle medewerkers van onze directie  Hoe ziet je inwerkprogramma eruit  Om ervoor te zorgen dat jij snel jouw draai kunt vinden binnen ons team en in de werkzaamheden  werken wij met een buddy systeem  Elke dag starten wij met een dagstart met het team van business en data analisten om elkaar aan te kunnen versterken in werkzaamheden indien nodig  Je wordt binnen 6 maanden opgeleid tot een  junior  python developer  Functie eisen Kennis of data analist  je hebt ervaring met ERP systemen  financiële en inkoopprocessen is een pre  je spreekt en schrijft uitstekend Nederlands  Naast de eisen herken jezelf in de volgende eigenschappen je bent een teamspeler met een pro actieve houding  je bent goed in verbanden leggen tussen gegevens en vraagstukken en biedt daar ook een passende oplossing voor  je bent klantgericht en speelt in op de Solynta  based in Wageningen  the Netherlands  is a hybrid potato breeding company that  develops hybrid potato varieties with superior traits and performance at a rate much faster  than can be achieved with traditional breeding  The successful application of hybrid breeding  enables the use of Hybrid True Potato Seeds  HTPS   This revolution in breeding not only  allows for much faster product development  but also offers enormous logistical and  phytosanitary advantages  2500 kg of traditional seed tubers are replaced by 25 grams of  seed  Solynta is at the forefront of this innovation and  with its patented technology  platform  is ideally positioned to tap into the multi billion dollar global market for potato  genetics  www solynta com    To expand the research team  we are looking for a Digital Phenotyping Data Analyst   MSc  Full time  For our selections on plants and on tubers we are looking for possibilities to use digital  phenotyping methods for improving the data collection  You are the person that determines  the best way to phenotype different traits  and that calibrates digital phenotyping data with  actual plant measurements  You have experience in image analysis and machine learning   The goal of this position is to develop methods of digital phenotyping to a tool that breeders  can use to make selections KEY ACTIVITIES  RESPOSIBILITIES Image analysis of plants Processing of raw data into interpretable information Correlation of digital phenotyping data to plant traits Automatization of data processing pipelinesWE ASK An MSc in biosystems engineering or similar Image analysis and machine learning skills Experience in digital phenotyping techniques Insight in plant growth characteristics Interest to translate science into a usable product Ability to work closely together with diverse peopleWE OFFER    A one year employment contract with the prospect of permanent employment A competitive salary depending on work experience and education The opportunity to become part of an enthusiastic group of people working on one of the world s most promising innovations for improving food supply   Location  Wageningen  The Netherlands  If you are motivated to strengthen the potato hybrid breeding program at Solynta  we would  like to invite you to send a motivation letter and CV to recruitment solynta com   If you have any questions about the vacancy  please contact Julia Stockem  tel   31   0 6 51894987  This vacancy has no fixed end date

Battolyser Systems is looking to recruit a Data Scientist Welcome to Battolyser Systems  a fully funded  cleantech scale up company based in The Netherlands  We develop and manufacture products that can store electricity and produce hydrogen from renewable power to balance societal demand in a truly revolutionary way  Let us take you on this journey and show how you can make a difference by joining a fast growing purpose driven company   First  some background information on Battolyser Systems  Seven years ago  some really smart people at the Delft University of Technology invented the world s first integrated battery and electrolyser system  They named it a  Battolyser  and realized this invention could connect renewable power generation in a revolutionary way with how society will consume energy in a net zero emission world  To make real impact  the technology was spun out of the Delft University of Technology into a separate company in 2018 to demonstrate a proof of concept in an industrial setting  And so  Battolyser Systems was born  Fast forward to today  We have a patented and proven technology  customers are lined up and funding is secured  We have also attracted top talent in the renewable energy and hydrogen market  whom are passionate and motivated to make a difference  Knowledgeable  connected and committed are some of the keywords that best describe current leadership  In growing the company we are looking for a data scientist to join our team and help us and our customers realize the value that Battolyser unlocks The Role  This role is part of the business development team  You are responsible for modelling and optimizing the value a Battolyser creates  Thanks to the unique technology a Battolyser unlocks value in different electricity markets  day ahead  balancing and frequency  and by producing clean hydrogen  In your role you will interact closely with the rest of the business development team and potentially with customers and the product team  Specific task include   Own and improve a Python model that optimizes and compares the value of Battolyser to competing technologies Set up a robust  version control environment to manage model development in a structured manner Work with the business development and sales team to model the performance of a Battolyser in different set ups  e g  grid connected  off grid  hydrogen customer on site  and geographies Use data visualization tools to develop reports to present the outcomes of your modelling Identify and implement new algorithms to optimize the trade offs that a Battolyser allows a customers to make  Co  Develop a strategy to help our customers realize the value of a Battolyser  including options to support customers to operate  dispatch  the Battolyser in real time The Person  We feel  in order to be successful in this role  you need at least 2 4 years of experience with Python in a professional context  You need to have a firm grip on Object Oriented Programming  OOP  and be comfortable in Git  Also  experience with data visualization is a must  You are self driven and intrinsically motivated to build the best model possible and unlock value to our customers  You can strike a good balance between optimizing and being flexible to tailor your priorities to business needs  Finally  you want to learn and aspire a career in renewable energy  Oh  and if you have experience in data science  operational optimization or energy market modelling that would really set you apart  How to apply  Hopefully we managed to get you interested  If you feel you are the right fit with the right motivation we can t wait to receive your application  Battolyser Systems is an Equal Opportunity Employer and welcomes Diversity

Job description Would you like to work on shaping tomorrow s world  Contribute to groundbreaking innovations and developments in technological knowledge  Are you a team player who feels at home in an international and interdisciplinary environment  Then we are looking for you  Eindhoven University of Technology  TU e  is an internationally oriented research university  specializing in engineering  science   technology and is known for its large scientific impact and its role in developing technological innovations  TU e is a university at the center of society and sets its focus on complex social challenges by concentrating its education and research on three Strategic Areas  Energy  Health and Smart Mobility  An ambitious university requires dedicated support to our scientists  the support service Data Management   Library  DML  plays a key role at TU e within the fields of Research Data Management  RDM   General Data Management and Open Science  Furthermore  DML comprises the University library and archives  and provides information skills training to bachelor  master and PhD students  The DML staff totals 50 employees  Job description We are looking for a research data management specialist  data steward  with an enterprising and customer oriented attitude  who will shape RDM support to the university s researchers  You will support researchers in addressing internal and external requirements with regards to RDM  applying FAIR principles to research data  and so contribute to reuse and reproducibility of research  Your work will cover a broad scope of topics  which vary from assistance in RDM planning  advice on storage  archiving and publication of research data  handling privacy sensitive data  policy making  to providing and developing training in RDM skills  You will serve as first line of support for privacy related matters  working closely with the Privacy team and performing the first assessment of the privacy compliance in research projects  Besides  you will contribute to the further development of data stewardship within TU e  You report to the Head of Research Data Management and closely cooperate with colleague data stewards  DML   colleagues from Information   Management Services  IMS  and other services  You will Support and advise researchers on RDM related issues such as for example  Preparing and implementing Data Management Plans  DMP   Drafting data paragraphs for grant proposals  Storing  publishing and archiving research data  Preparing their submissions for Ethical Review Board approval  Handling privacy sensitive data in compliance with legal requirements and institutionalpolicies and guidelines Applying FAIR priniciples to research data  Fullfilling financial and legal requirements concerning research data  Support and advise researchers on privacy related issues such as for example  Drafting informed consent and privacy notices  Evaluating privacy roles within research collaborations and consortia and identifying the needed agreements and documents  Identifying and assessing privacy and legal risks  including copyright and licensing  during the entire research lifecycle  Preparing Data Protection Impact Assessments  DPIA  in collaboration with the Privacy team  Contribute to the development of data stewardship and RDM services at TU e  Raise awareness on RDM and handling privacy senstive data among researchers  Develop and provide trainings on RDM and privacy GDPR compliance  Establish a functional and appropriate services supply chain for researchers in coordination with colleagues  Job requirements You are expected to have the following qualifications and characteristics  An academic level of work and thinking  preferably a completed Master or PhD in the technical or medical sciences  and an affinity with research practice  Proactive and result oriented attitude and gain energy from pioneering and collaborating within a relatively new field of work in support of scientific research  Ability to easily assimilate knowledge and not afraid to learn on the job  Skilled in transferring and sharing knowledge to staff  students  junior researchers and senior researchers  Ability to connect and translate various requirements  i e   legal  policy and technical  into solutions and best practices with regards to research data management and data stewardship  Customer oriented and supportive way of working  gain energy from supporting and solving issues for others  Networking skills and feel comfortable with connecting people and building networks  Excellent communication and negotiating skills and can be authoritative when the situation requires it  You are have excellent English language skills  both orally and in writing  Proficiency in the Dutch language is not a requirement  but it is an advantage  Preferably you have  Experience in handling privacy sensitive data and knowledge of GDPR  and or willingness to develop yourself further in this field  Experience or a demonstrable affinity with research data management and data stewardship within higher education or a research institution  Knowledge which will contribute to applying FAIR principles to research data  e g  on metadata  standards   Conditions of employment You will be appointed for a one year period  Appointment via Euflex  the TU e secondment organization  will be considered  If performance is good  this appointment may be made permanent  Full time gross salary  depending on research experience  competences and educational background  will be a minimum of   2 968   and a maximum of   5 211    salary scale 9 11 CAO NU and UFO profile Specialist Scientific Information 2   The year end allowance is 8 3  of the annual salary  corresponding to a monthly salary   The holiday allowance is 8  of the annual salary  In addition  TU e offers excellent secondary conditions of employment  e g   a minimum of 41 days of leave based on a 40 hour working week and excellent sports facilities  flexible working hours  an excellent pension scheme via the ABP    Information and application For information please contact  Marijella van der Klugt    31 40 2476345 Linde Keverkamp    31 40 2476303

hoe zij dat op een zo efficient mogelijke wijze voor elkaar weten te krijgen  De klantvraag staat altijd centraal en wordt nooit uit het oog verloren  Je op den duur een brug te slaan tussen klanten goed onderbouwde beslissingen  Je gaat data opsporen  ontsluiten en presenteren  Door slimme algoritmen zorg je er voor dat onze opdrachtgevers tot betere inzichten komen  Kortom  je gaat je data skills inzetten om echte problemen op te lossen  Begrip van de context is daarvoor noodzakelijk  Vaak werk je dan ook samen met onze vastgoedspecialisten  samen komen jullie tot de beste oplossing Je pioniert samen met een team aan onze innovaties  Het zou mooi zijn als je ervaring hebt met ETL en R  maar daar kunnen we je ook bij helpen  Je werkt meestal aan drie of vier projecten tegelijkertijd  Denk bijvoorbeeld aan de ontwikkeling van tooling voor assetmanagement  de waardering van woningportefeuilles op basis van open data of een benchmark van het voorzieningenniveau van gemeenten  Sommige aan dat onze ervaren data specialisten je helpen in jouw ontwikkeling Dit is echt iets voor jou want jij   bent vastberaden en hebt doorzettingsvermogen   grit  noemen we dat  google maar eens bent spelen een  disruptive  rol binnen het publiek vastgoedHier ga je werkenRepubliq is een Great Place to Work    al 4 jaar op rij   Jouw toekomstige teamgenoten beoordeelden Republiq op de thema s geloofwaardigheid  respect  eerlijkheid  trots en kameraadschap met een 9 9  Samen bouwen we aan het tofste vastgoed adviesbureau van Nederland  We willen met innovatieve oplossingen de vastgoedsector professionaliseren  We creëren de randvoorwaarden waarbinnen iedereen kan excelleren  Nu is het aan jou om voor jezelf een fantastische baan te creëren  We geloven dat als iedereen doet waar hij zij goed in is  dat we samen de mooiste resultaten bereiken  Dat begint met hard werken en daar ook vooral heel veel plezier in hebben  Lees de Republethiqs op onze website om meer te weten komen over onze manier van werken Hoe ziet de procedure er uit Stap 1  Binnen 5 dagen een reactie  we beoordelen je CV en motivatie en binnen vijf dagen ontvang je van ons een reactie Stap 2  Het 1e gesprek  als we denken dat Republiq bij jou past  nodigen we je uit voor een eerste gesprek  Dit gesprek is meestal met een van onze meer ervaren medewerkers Stap 3  Capaciteitentest  als we na het eerste gesprek met een of twee andere medewerkers dan het eerste gesprek Stap 5  Arbeidsovereenkomst  als we na de gesprekken allebei positief zijn doen we je een aanbieding om bij ons te komen werken Dit zijn je nieuwe collega sSander de Clerck Samen met een groep slimme en gedreven mensen werken aan uitdagende projecten met maatschappelijke relevantie  Daar krijg ik energie van  Geen eindeloze overleggen De kans op een droombaan krijg je niet  die creëer je  Dus  droom jij van een baan als IT professional en ben je klaar om hier werk van te maken  Word je gedreven door nieuwsgierigheid  En heb je de wil om grenzen te verkennen en te verleggen  Dan ben je geknipt als trainee voor Transavia en is Createment de perfecte omgeving om jouw talent te ontwikkelen Het Createment traineeshipJij verdient de kans op een loopbaan als IT professional  Het talent heb je  net als de drive om je snel te ontwikkelen  Wij zorgen voor de juiste training  coaching en begeleiding  In een intensief traject van 14 maanden halen we samen de IT er in je naar boven en werk je toe naar een vaste baan als Data Analist bij Transavia  waar je jouw nieuwe loopbaan als IT professional vorm gaat geven Hoe werkt het  Na de eerste maanden  in de schoolbanken  ga je in de praktijk aan de slag binnen het centrale Strategy  Data   Intelligence  SDI  team bij Transavia  Je duikt volop in de wereld van data modelling  PowerBI  dashboards en SQL en ontwikkelt jezelf tot Data Analist  Nog geen idee wat je je hierbij moet voorstellen  Geen probleem  we leggen alles aan je uit Natuurlijk sta je er tijdens dit alles niet alleen voor  Jouw mede trainees vormen samen met je performance coach en buddy jouw leeromgeving  waarin je ruim een jaar lang het maximale uit jezelf haalt  ambitieuze doelen stelt én behaalt en je elkaar motiveert en inspireert Jij kiest voor Transavia  Transavia kiest voor jouOns motto is   We make low cost feel good   We zetten daarbij graag een stap extra voor onze passagiers en voor elkaar  De sfeer in de organisatie kenmerkt zich door bevlogen medewerkers met een groen hart  Elke dag werken we met elkaar samen om een gemeenschappelijk doel te behalen  een memorabele klantbeleving Transavia is een dynamische organisatie  never a dull moment  die continu probeert bij te blijven in een veranderende luchtvaartwereld  Wil jij graag werken in een omgeving met enthousiaste daadkrachtig collega s die oog hebben voor elkaar  Krijg je energie van verandering en vernieuwing en voel jij je het prettigst in een omgeving waar je regisseur bent van je eigen werk  Dan komen we graag met jou in contact Jij verdient  Een traject waarin jouw ontwikkeling centraal staat  je opleidingen volgt en certificaten behaalt Een performance coach die je meeneemt door een mooi soft skills programma en met wie je samen het beste in jezelf naar boven haalt Een salaris dat gedurende het jaar twee keer stijgt  Naarmate jij je ontwikkelt  stijgt je salaris mee Na het traineeship een vaste baan als Data Analist bij Transavia  met een salaris van minimaal  2 500 op basis van 40 uur per week Talent heb jeSkills kunnen we samen  door  ontwikkelen  Ervaring of een opleiding in IT is dus niet nodig  Het allerbelangrijkste vinden we dat je Gedreven wordt door de ambitie om een super goede software engineer te worden Over hbo  of wo werk  en  denkniveau beschikt De Nederlandse en Engelse taal voldoende beheerst Maak er werk vanPak jij die kans op een glanzende carrière als Data Analist  Top  geen tijd te verliezen dan  Meld je aan via de sollicitatiebutton  Dat kan super snel en makkelijk  want je hoeft in eerste instantie alleen je naam  e mailadres en telefoonnummer in te voeren  Op een later moment vul je je gegevens aan en maak je je sollicitatie Do you love to work with a highly skilled  enthusiastic and international team of data scientists  Are you keen about developing team members and the team  Are you just as passionate about creating more knowledge from data as we are  We have a vacancy for a team leader to lead the Data Science Team  16 fte  at Wageningen Food Safety Research  WFSR  WE ARE LOOKING FOR The use of data science is crucial to improve the safety of our food and feed  Within WFSR we have created a new data science team combining a broad range of skills and knowhow to apply data science in the domain of food safety  As team manager of the data science team  you are responsible for  developing  the team and the team members and also for the research and projects carried out by the team  The team leader  is part of the management team of the business unit and you contribute to the development and implementation of the strategic plans of the business unit with your colleague team leaders  is responsible for HR tasks such as implementing HR policy  absenteeism supervision  training and development plan  etc  is responsible for monitoring the scientific and technical quality of the research  builds and maintains valuable relationships with other teams  experts  research institutes  food authorities  and companies  acts as a motivated ambassador for data science and the WFSR data science team   within WFSR  WUR and beyond and by doing so acquires projects for the team  ensures that the projects placed within the data science team are implemented WFSR wide where necessary meaningful and plans the capacity of the team members in the projects  In our projects we use machine learning and artificial intelligence  bioinformatics   big  data analytics  programming  image processing  and data visualisation  For example  we develop emerging risk identification systems to identify  un known hazards in the food supply chain  We have used artificial intelligence technologies for the identification of chemicals that may be used in food supplements that were not known to us yet  We develop bioinformatics methods to improve the discovery and characterization of microbial pathogens in the food chain  The global food system faces many challenges with the changing climate  the need for sustainability  the changing societal demands  and the vulnerability of the integrity of the food system   Wageningen University   Research offers excellent terms of employment  A few highlights from our Collective Labour Agreement include  working hours that can be discussed and arranged so that they allow for the best possible work life balance  the option to accrue additional compensation hours by working more  up to 40 hours per week  sabbatical leave  study leave  and partially paid parental leave  there is a strong focus on vitality and you can make use of the sports facilities available on campus for a small fee  a fixed December bonus of 4    excellent pension scheme  In addition to these first rate employee benefits  you will of course receive a good salary  We offer  depending on your experience  a competitive gross salary of between   4 465   and   6 710   for a full time working week of 36 hours  in accordance with the CLA Wageningen Research  scale 13   Wageningen University   Research encourages internal advancement opportunities and mobility with an internal recruitment policy  There are plenty of options for personal initiative in a learning environment  and we provide excellent training opportunities  We are offering a multi faceted position in an international environment with a pleasant and open working atmosphere  You are going to work at the greenest and most innovative campus in The Netherlands  and at a university that has been chosen as the  Best University  in the Netherlands for the 16th consecutive time Coming from abroad Wageningen University   Research is the university and research centre for life sciences  The themes we deal with are relevant to everyone around the world and Wageningen  therefore  has a large international community and a lot to offer to international employees  Applicants from abroad moving to the Netherlands may qualify for a special tax relief  known as the 30  ruling  Our team of advisors on Dutch immigration procedures will help you with the visa application procedures for yourself and  if applicable  for your family  Feeling welcome also has everything to do with being well informed  Wageningen University   Research s International Community page contains practical information about what we can do to support international employees and students coming to Wageningen  Furthermore  we can assist you with any additional advice and information about helping your partner to find a job  housing  schooling  and other issues   Wageningen University   Research The mission of Wageningen University and Research is  To explore the potential of nature to improve the quality of life   Under the banner Wageningen University   Research  Wageningen University and the specialised research institutes of the Wageningen Research Foundation have joined forces in contributing to finding solutions to important questions in the domain of healthy food and living environment  With its roughly 30 branches  6 800 employees and 12 900 students  Wageningen University   Research is one of the leading organisations in its domain  An integrated approach to problems and the cooperation between various disciplines are at the heart of Wageningen s unique approach  WUR has been named Best Employer in the Education category for 2019 2020  Read the 5 reasons why your future colleagues enjoy working at WUR and watch this video to get an idea of our green campus  We will recruit for the vacancy ourselves  so no employment agencies please  However  sharing in your network is appreciated We are looking for a team leader  Who has an Msc degree and a good understanding of doing research and working in a research organization  Who has a solid understanding of data science and the benefits of the different techniques and tools that are being used  Someone who is able to evaluate the merits of the work and has a vision of the future projects  Who has shown excellent people management skills and loves to coach and stimulate the further development of the professionals in the team  Someone with passion for research and a strong interest in the agrifood domain  Who has  preferably  a strong network relevant to the data science work being performed at WFSR  Who is fluent in English and speaking Dutch on conversation level is a must  For more information about this position  please contact  Ir  Marloes Groenewegen  interim team leader  06   42514331 or by Marloes groenewegen wur nl For more information about the procedure  please contact  Talitha Bots  HR Advisor  0317   48 63 17 of by talitha bots wur nlDo you want to apply  You can apply directly using the apply button on the vacancy page on our website which will allow us to process your personal information with your approval  Don t wait with your application  As soon as we have received your application and we see a match  we will invite you for an interview  The job interviews will be held in Dutch and English  An assessment can be part of the application procedure Equal opportunities  Wageningen University   Research  WUR  employs a large number of people with very different backgrounds and qualities  who inspire and motivate each other  We want every talent to feel at home in our organisation and be offered the same career opportunities  We therefore especially welcome applications from people who are underrepresented at WUR  For more information please go to our inclusivity page  A good example of how WUR deals with inclusiveness can be read on the page working at WUR with a functional impairment

throughout all distribution channels in the European bicycle and fishing tackle industry  The vision is to become and stay European market leading supplier of high quality products and be a well respected supplier in the outdoor business  ensuring good relationships and acting very customer and market oriented  The European Head office is based at the High Tech Campus in Eindhoven  In order to strengthen our operations team  we are recruiting for a Data Manager Teamlead  As the Manager Data Maintenance you are a Information Strategist  Business Transformation leader  Developer of Talent correct data collection policies and methods Give proper training to employees to be able to perform data collection independently and effectively Ensure the proper functioning of data collection Information Architecture and have experience with data governance  You have strong analytical and planning skills  You are are customer oriented and able to influence  negotiate and communicate with both external customers and internal stakeholders  You are familiar with working in an international  complex  high profile and rapidly changing environment  You are a self starter  team player  coach including formal presentation skills  multi language skills  e g  Dutch  are a plus  What do we have to offer  Shimano and its subsidiaries offer a pleasant  informal working environment with colleagues who work well together  and are proud to work for Shimano  Next to good working conditions  Shimano offers you the opportunity to work in a responsible and challenging position within a dynamic  international and ambitious environment  Together we want to win therefore we have a strong focus on team achievement

job_desc: Mendix is a low code app development platform  First  what is low code  Low code is a visual approach to software development that enables you to abstract and automate every step of the application lifecycle  Gartner predicts that  by 2024  low code application development will be responsible for more than 65  of application development activity   Mendix is repeatedly ranked a Leader in analyst reports from Gartner and Forrester  In the 2021 Gartner  Magic Quadrant for Multiexperience Development Platforms  Mendix placed at the very top of the Leaders quadrant   Mendix  the global leader in enterprise low code  was created to promote collaboration between Business   IT teams  Thousands of forward thinking companies around the world like Ford Auto  Rabobank Netherlands  Zurich Insurance  and Red Bull  can unleash their best ideas faster with the help of the Mendix Platform   Mendix is a Siemens Business   Siemens is a Top 10 Global Software Company and a leader on Fast Company s Most Innovative Companies in the World  With the acquisition of Mendix in 2018  Siemens Digital Industries Software is driving transformation to enhance the digital enterprise where engineering  manufacturing and electronics meet the future of innovation  Mendix employees have the opportunity to work in a hyper growth environment with the support of Siemens  unbeatable market position and resources  As an intern  you will work mainly on two assignments  1  The development of a data monitoring dashboard to help businesses stay in control of data quality issues  Below are the use cases expected to be initially covered on the monitoring platform   Consistency in prediction scores across the Mendix systems Relationship Integrity between salesforce contacts and accounts Consistency between user profile data Completeness of accounts records across the different Mendix systems Reconciliation of Mendix and Siemens contracts Type of data issues include  Data accuracy  comparing against a set of rules  Data consistency  comparing against a corresponding dataset  Missing Incomplete data or records Data integrity issues  checking that data meets certain business rules   2  Assist in making detail technical data documentation of data from source to destination  This includes all data moving from the different source systems  in transit  and to the data lake   Marketing data flowing from source through Marketo and Salesforce to the data lake  Salesforce data moving to Zuora and to the data lake Zuora data moving to SAP and to the data lake Other duties include  Maintaining overview of ongoing data issues  tracking and documenting progress Support the Data Quality Manager on a tactical and operational level  Requirements  Recent graduate in computer science or a related field in IT  Bachelor s degree would be ideal Relational database proficiency experience Data modelling  Technical writing experience Computer programming experience Experience with SQL is a must  R and or Python experience is beneficial  Microsoft Power BI experience   preferred Mendix Rapid Application Development experience   Beneficial Agile development experience  Scrum    Preferred Ability to Speak write English fluently  Dutch speaking is preferable  Ability to work under indirect supervision Flexible in a fast paced dynamic environment with shifting roles and responsibilities Fast and eager to learn new concepts Ability to multi task   work well under pressure Strong computer technical skills Excellent verbal and writing communication skills Working for Mendix and with our Customers means your reliability has to be beyond any doubt  and therefore every employment is subject to a onboarding screening and the condition precedent a Certificate of Conduct is provided that demonstrates you did not commit any offenses that are relevant to the performance of your function   LI PN1 Working at MendixMendix has been recognized as a Best Cloud Computing Company to Work For by Forbes  With offices in 16  countries including headquarters in Rotterdam and Boston  Mendix provides an international playground to truly impact the world through low code   While each employee brings their own unique cultures and personalities to the workplace  we collectively live by our Mendix Blue Guiding Principles  While we live on different continents  speak different languages  and work on different things  we are bound by our  MendixBlue  guiding principles  Being  MendixBlue  means that you live the culture  and you consistently improve it as we grow  It s kind of a big deal  We put the customer first  Without our customers  we have no business  So  if you act in the best interest of our customers  always you belong here  We think big  We work to have a meaningful  lasting impact on the world  So  if you aim high and think long term you belong here  We innovate  We want to be what happens next  So  if you ask  what if   and work to find a way or make one you belong here We nurture talent  We look  not just at the sum of what an individual has done  but at the potential of who they can be  So  if you re up for learning from your failures you belong here  We hear every voice  Inflated egos don t last here  humility does  So  if you share credit and ensure that the best ideas win   regardless of who they come from you belong here  We own it  If something needs doing  we do it  So  if you focus on the outcome  and take initiative to get it done you belong here  We have fun  We use laughter as a common language  We can ask for help and we re happy to give it  So  if you find joy and purpose in what you do you belong here

Als Data analist ben je werkzaam bij het Bedrijfsbureau van de afdeling Vastgoed Exploitatie  VGE  waar ongeveer 20 medewerkers werken  Vastgoed exploitatie is één van de zes afdelingen van Stadsbedrijven  VGE is verantwoordelijk voor het dagelijks onderhoud  beheer en verhuur van een groot deel van het Utrechtse vastgoed  Denk aan zwembaden  begraafplaatsen  parkeergarages  We zorgen voor gastvrijheid én leveren facilitaire diensten  Ons doel daarbij is tevreden klanten  een optimale bezetting en een goede duurzame bedrijfsvoering  We sturen naast klanttevredenheid ook op de kosten en baten van de accommodaties  Samen met zes andere afdelingen vormen we Stadsbedrijven  Het dagelijks werk van Stadsbedrijven is het visitekaartje van de gemeente  Iedereen ziet ons werk Dit is je werk Als Data analist draag je bij aan de controle van inkomende data en zoek je verbanden in gegevensverzameling en vertaalt dit naar concrete sturingsinformatie  Wat het werk leuk maakt is dat je een brug slaat tussen de technische inhoud en de menselijke kant van het verzamelen van data  Je gaat het gesprek aan met de bedrijfsleiders van de verschillende afdelingen  Denk daarbij aan het je een veelzijdige en afwisselende baan met ontwikkelmogelijkheden voor de toekomst  Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou   WAT GA JE DOEN ALS ONZE DATA ANALIST   Als onze Data analist ben je verantwoordelijk voor de analysefase  Hierbij denk je ook buiten de reguliere bedrijfsvoering en vaste patronen om en zorg je voor pragmatische oplossingen  Met jouw  data driven mindset  help je jouw collega s bij het onderzoeken  analyseren en oplossen van businessproblemen  Bovenal haal je vanuit je data analyses nieuwe kansen en denkrichtingen naar boven  Zo voeg je direct waarde toe aan de diensten van BFG Warehousing  Je dagelijkse werk bestaat uit het verzamelen en ordenen van relevante data  waarbij je deze controleert op correctheid en datamodellen ontwikkelt  Je maakt rapportages en analyses en helpt bij het automatiseren hiervan  Ook lever je een bijdrage aan voorspel  en optimalisatiemodellen om de klanttevredenheid  effectiviteit en performance te verbeteren  Daarbij breng je advies uit aan het management  Je rapporteert aan de Teamleider Supply Chain Planning   Forecast  BFG Warehousing is als logistiek servicepartner in de foodbranche meer dan alleen een logistiek dienstverlener  We bedienen de hele keten  van forecasting richting leveranciers tot de analyse van aflevertijden bij klanten en het voorkomen en beheersen van derving in de foodchain  Door data slim en innovatief in te zetten  genereer jij waardevolle nieuwe inzichten in de Supply Chain van BFG Warehousing en zijn opdrachtgevers  Jij hebt de vrijheid om deze nieuwe functie samen met de Teamleider belangrijke bijdrage aan het verzamelen en op een klantvriendelijke wijze beschikbaar te stellen van de gewenste vastgoedinformatie  Je bent op de hoogte van de laatste technologische ontwikkelen in de digitale informatie  en datavoorziening en in staat de verzamelde vastgoedinformatie gestructureerd te verwerken  te analyseren  te visualiseren en te borgen in de daarvoor geschikte informatiesystemen  Je bent gedreven om  gebruik makend van meerdere informatiebronnen de juiste data te ontdekken om tot stuurinformatie en  Business Intelligence oplossingen  te komen voor onze staat spilfiguren bij onze opdrachtgevers te interviewen en resultaten te rapporteren in de vorm van project  en implementatieplannen  De opgestelde plannen breng je met een team tot uitvoering en Ben jij toe aan een nieuwe uitdaging in een dynamische werkomgeving binnen een gedreven team  Wil jij meebouwen aan onze successen ECW Energy is als particulier netbeheerder  energieproducent en handelaar  met eigen netwerken van kabels  leidingen  productie  en opslaginstallaties steeds op zoek naar de meest duurzame en efficiënte manier om energie te leveren aan bedrijven die veel energie nodig hebben  zoals bijvoorbeeld grote glastuinbouwbedrijven  Zo dragen wij bij aan een duurzame toekomst Wij zijn gevestigd op het Noord Hollandse bedrijventerrein Agriport en in het glastuinbouw gebied Andijk waar onze afdeling Handel zich bezighoudt met het ondersteunen van de interne en externe klanten bij het optimaliseren van hun productie en verbruik ten opzichte van de energiemarkten Dit doen we door het aanbod te bundelen en te verhandelen op diverse markten en door slim gebruik te maken van onze opties  koop  verkoop  productie en opslag voor verschillende energiedragers  Waar mogelijk maken we hierbij gebruik van automatisering wat voor een deel  in huis  wordt ontwikkeld en beheerd Ter versterking van ons team in Middenmeer zijn wij op zoek naar een Data analist je onderbouwd een conclusie trekken  Dan ben jij de persoon die we zoeken  Je houdt je bezig met het analyseren van marktdata  klantdata en ontwikkelingen op de energiemarkten en dit stelt je in staat om een keuze te maken Taken en verantwoordelijkhedenJe analyseert verschillende soorten data en je ziet handelskansen Je schakelt met collega s in het handelsteam over de ontwikkelingen op de energiemarkten De conclusies van je modellen voer je uit op de energiemarkt CompetentiesJe hebt gevoel voor overzicht en structuur Je hebt een beheers mentaliteit Je krijgt energie van  data  analyse Join Our Team  Big companies don t make great bikes  Great people do   We help people make the most of their bike ride by creating some of the most original  easy to enjoy  and best performing bicycle products   We make bikes for everybody   as cycling develops and grows worldwide  we re looking for more great people to join us  If you re looking to enjoy working in a culture of innovation with a team of like minded people  then we may have something for you here   If you love riding bikes as much as we do  then we re already on the same page  Let s see what we can create together   Cycling Sports Group strives to become a data driven organization and data must be become valuable for us but as well for our customers  To strengthen our own capabilities and use of data we want to define clear and uniform processes to manage our data   About your job  As a Master Data Specialist  you manage the process to create  update and display data used in our sales processes  You are working on describing and governing these processes in SAP and in our CRM application  Your success is defined by the quality and timely availability of this data to the end users in these systems  You are analytical and understand the impact of your activities and what the data objects mean to their relevant business processes   As a member of the SAP team  you will be responsible for supporting operations by monitoring  analyzing and updating master data for Credit   Sales within the organization as well as assisting with reporting and ad hoc analysis  Help ensure master data integrity in key systems as well as maintaining the processes to support the data quality regarding Credit and Sales  Set up of new customers and maintain dealer credit master data in ERP system  Identify areas for data quality improvements and help to resolve through the appropriate choice of error detection and correction  process control and improvement  or process design strategies  Documentation of changes in master data  Identify areas for process improvements in order to streamline the workflow  Manage mass changes to accounts including commercial policy conditions  Provide UAT tests for new internal processes and reports regarding Credit and Sales  Identifying  analyzing and communicating risks and opportunities to the SAP Business Manager on a timely basis as well as ensuring any accounting reporting issues are cleared up in a timely manner  Contribute to the success of CSG by assisting with other projects and tasks as assigned continuously striving for improvement  Your Experience Bachelor s degree in Finance   Business Administration or Data oriented experience or degrees is required  3  years  experience with SAP ECC or S4Hana in an international business environment  Specific SAP  MS Dynamics knowledge  Must be fluent in Dutch and English  Must be extremely detail oriented with strong organizational and problem solving skills  Continuously striving for improvements  Strong customer centric focus  Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work across cultures and functions  Strong communication  presentation and relationship building skills  You are extremely detail oriented with strong organizational and problem solving skills  you are continuously striving for improvements  You have strong interpersonal skills and ability to work across cultures and functions and you have strong communication  presentation and relationship building skills   Sounds like you   Become a part of the Cannondale family  Do you want to combine your passion with your work  Have you always wanted to work in an international and dynamic company  Now is your chance to become part of our ambitious team at the European HQ in the Netherlands  Within Cannondale you will be working alongside colleagues who have an aspiration for sports and health  Colleagues with whom you can have fun riding lunch rides in beautiful nature with plenty of bike trails  Or do you prefer to work out in our own gym  It won t take long before you will be working in the coolest cycling hub of the world  based on beautiful campus in the center of the Netherlands   Along with a competitive salary and benefits package  we offer you a challenging role at an international company with strong brands including Cannondale  where you can work with very supportive colleagues  If you have an aspiration to work with some great cycling brands and an extremely dedicated and passionate team  please get in touch  Recruitment europe cyclingsportsgroup com  WE ARE A CYCLE FRIENDLY EMPLOYER  The cycle friendly employer certification scheme was developed to establish a European standard for cycle friendly companies  The certification is intended to help European companies to improve the situation for employees that cycle to work  As an acknowledgement for our effort we received the certificate  cycle friendly employer    We are fully committed to providing a harmonious working environment in which our employees can maximise their full potential and to contribute to business success  irrespective of their age  gender  gender expression or identity  gender
