skills: ai, marketing, azure, python, tensorflow, sql, git
job_desc: Wij zoeken jou als Data Scientist Voor ons Strategy  Data   Intelligence  SDI  team bij Transavia zijn wij op zoek naar een Data Scientist  Dit team leidt de transformatie naar het data gedreven werken  adviseert afdelingen aan de hand van informatie en inzichten  en bouwt aan data  en AI oplossingen voor klanten en medewerkers van Transavia  Het team is opgericht om Transavia naar een hoger niveau te brengen in Data   Analytics  Als Data Scientist ontwikkel je een brede range aan advanced analytics en ML AI oplossingen  van recommenders tot forecasting modellen en decision support tools  Heb jij een passie voor slimme modellen en optimalisatie strategieën  Ben jij gedreven om de business nog slimmer te laten werken en klanten beter te servicen met advanced analytics en ML AI oplossingen  Dan ben jij mogelijk de Data Scientist naar wie wij op zoek zijn   Wat ga je doen   Je werkt aan AI  Machine Learning en Optimization oplossingen voor de verschillende domeinen binnen Transavia  Denk aan marketing   sales  revenue management  planning   scheduling  technische dienst  het operations control center  etc  Samen met een Data Analyst en of Engineer vertaal je de doelstellingen van het AI ML product door in data  kwaliteits vereisten en een opzet voor het experiment prototype of nieuwe release  Samen met de Data Engineers werk je aan de data en machine learning pipelines om het model in productie te kunnen zetten in onze Microsoft Azure cloud omgeving  De resultaten deel je  tussentijds  middels visuals en dashboards  Met andere woorden  je werkt aan de AI ML oplossingen van begin tot eind  van concept  ontwikkeling en implementatie tot beheer en monitoring van de tools in productie  van MVP prototype tot verschillende opvolgende releases  Zo optimaliseren we flight schedules  automatiseren we real time aanbevelingen voor klanten  forecasten we de benodigde crew standby en call center bezetting of bedenken we hoe we ons netwerk en vluchtschema kunnen optimaliseren  Je zal onderdeel uitmaken van het Strategy  Data   Intelligence  SDI  team dat naast Data Scientists bestaat uit de Lead SDI  Lead Data Scientist  Analytics Translators  Data Engineers  Data Analysts en Business Consultants  Je zal veel samenwerken met jouw SDI collega s  de business en onze  data  collega s bij Transavia Frankrijk Wie ben jij  Je herkent je in onze waarden daadkrachtig  bevlogen  verantwoordelijk en vriendelijk  én je hebt dat  tikkeltje lef  Je hebt een wo diploma in een business analytics  econometrie   toegepaste  wiskunde of een andere data science gerelateerde studie en minimaal 5 jaar relevante ervaring in een data science positie Je bent beschikbaar voor minimaal 32 uur per week Spreek je de Nederlandse taal nog niet zo goed als dat je zou willen  Maar spreek je wel uitstekend Engels  Dan zijn wij ook zeker geïnteresseerd in jou  Als Data Scientist  Heb je data science kennis  vanuit zowel de theorie als praktijk  op het gebied van advanced analytics  machine learning  operations research  statistics  data visualization  software engineering  model interpretation  etc  Gebruik je deze kennis om een probleem uit de business te vertalen naar een wiskundige en technische oplossing  Kun je problemen  maar ook kansen identificeren en begrijpen  Daarnaast ben je in staat om je data om te zetten in een concreet advies waar jij zelf  of het team  mee aan de slag kan  Ben je in staat om deze problemen om te zetten naar optimalisatie modellen en de juiste  scoring  metrics te gebruiken om de performance te evalueren  Heb je kennis van verschillende AI ML en OR best practices en ben je continu op zoek hoe je de kwaliteit van onze producten kan verbeteren  en hoe dit breed in het team toegepast kan worden   Heb je ervaring met Python en veelgebruikte packages  bijv  Pandas  Numpy  Scikit learn  Keras  Tensorflow  Pyspark  etc   of soortgelijke programmeertalen en de ambitie om Python te leren  Kun je goed overweg met SQL  Git en CLI  Ervaring met Cloud en of MLops is een pré  Ben je bedreven in het gebruik van Pulp  Gurobi of vergelijkbare solvers  Werk je agile  Wat je ontdekt  pas je gelijk toe  Wat kan je van ons verwachten   Werken voor dé nummer 1 budgetluchtvaartmaatschappij  Vrijheid om je functie naar eigen inzicht vorm te geven  Veel ruimte en initiatieven voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling  22 verlof  en 4 adv dagen o b v  een fulltime dienstverband  Vriendelijke en bevlogen collega s  Last but not least  ben je reislustig  dan is onze IPB regeling  tegen mooie tarieven vliegen indien plaats beschikbaar  zeker de moeite waard  Deze functie is ingeschaald in een functiegroep 10 of 11  Afhankelijk van kennis en ervaring doen wij een aanbieding van tussen de 3 202   en 6 120   euro bruto per maand  Over Transavia Ons motto is   We make low cost feel good   We zetten daarbij graag een stap extra voor onze passagiers en voor elkaar  De sfeer in de organisatie kenmerkt zich door bevlogen medewerkers met een groen hart  Elke dag werken we met elkaar samen om een gemeenschappelijk doel te behalen  een memorabele klantbeleving   Transavia is een dynamische organisatie  never a dull moment  die continu probeert bij te blijven in een veranderende luchtvaartwereld  Wil jij graag werken in een omgeving met enthousiaste daadkrachtig collega s die oog hebben voor elkaar  Krijg je energie van verandering en vernieuwing en voel jij je het prettigst in een omgeving waar je regisseur bent van je eigen werk  Dan komen we graag met jou in contact  Is deze functie jou op het lijf geschreven en wil je solliciteren  Ben jij de Data Scientist die wij zoeken en kom je ons team versterken  Solliciteer dan direct via onderstaande button  Heb je vragen over deze vacature  Neem dan contact op ons via recruitment transavia com  Werk je bij een bureau en wil je een kandidaat voorstellen voor deze vacature als Data Scientist bij Transavia  Bedankt  maar hier gaan we niet op in  We werven onze nieuwe collega graag zelf

Technologie en IT Boxtel 38   38 uur What do you do as a Data Analyst   As a Data Analyst you will play a big part in our Vion Business Analytics Competence Center  VBACC   Vion aims to become a data driven organization  The further development of a Vion wide Azure data platform is a key step in doing so  You will act as the bridge between the business stakeholders and the development team  Data engineers  Data modelers  Front end specialists  You will work in an Agile environment where you discuss requirements with business stakeholders  translate them into solution designs  plan the deliverables  and work as part of the development team towards a successful result  You will perform exploratory data analysis  identify and perform data quality checks  and are able to communicate findings clearly to the relevant stakeholders in the organization  Top 100 food company Every day 100 million consumers worldwide eat a meal with a little bit of Vion  This quantity comes with a big responsibility  At Vion we work passionately every day on the global food challenge  feeding 9 billion people in 2050  How can you contribute to this  The main responsibilities of the role can be described as follows  create the bridge between the business stakeholders and the development team  you gather requirements in the business for dashboards   reports and translate them into appropriate solution designs  you provide technical support to developers in the business and plan the deliverables  you will standardize  optimize and safeguard the Vion processes and dashboard functionalities like designs  scripting  presentation choices  test findings  availability and authorizations in collaboration with the other BI team members  the BI Product Owners  the MDM team and the department IM T  you will contribute to and guide the reporting questions and projects based on your BI knowledge and business affinity  you give solicited and unsolicited advice to the BI Product Owners and Management in the field of BI process improvements and data quality  you perform exploratory data analysis  you will identify and perform data validation and communicate the findings to the relevant stakeholders to improve business processes What do we expect from you  you have a Master s degree in IT or technical subject  you have a minimum 3 years of experience with business analysis and data analysis  you have experience with the Agile and Scrum way of working and with Data warehousing and Business intelligence projects  knowledge of SQL  Python  Microsoft Azure  data visualization tools  strong communication skills both verbal and written and fluent in Dutch and English  strong analytical skills  you are able to structure and solve both conceptual and concrete problems  pro active  pragmatic  customer oriented  hands on mentality with regards to data  team player with good social skills  What can you expect from us  In our company you will have an attractive  versatile and permanent position  with proven suitability  within a leading international food company  with around 12 400 employees worldwide  innovative market concepts and clear core values  You will be able to influence and shape Vion s digital transition  We offer excellent working conditions and an inspiring environment to work in and an enthusiastic team  Are you interested   In case you think you are the right candidate to become our new colleague  or would you like to have more information about this position  Share your talents with us by sending your application letter and resume via the apply button below  For information ask Maartje Faassen via phone number  31 88 995 3555 For this position Vion is looking for direct contacts with potential candidates  we appreciate if companies do not offer their services in this  Hoofdkantoor Vion Foodgroup Boseind 15  5281 RM Boxtel  NB

An exciting opportunity has arisen to work for the surf   lifestyle brand O Neill as a Data Analyst E Commerce in the Netherlands  Warmond   nearby Leiden  As our Data Analyst E Commerce  you are representing the voice of the ONeill website customers  You make it measurable and insightful how our audience is surfing around our website  In an ocean full of data  you are able to make rock solid analyses You will be part of the E Commerce team  which is responsible for all ONeill websites in Europe  As our Data Analyst  you have a facilitating role towards the rest of the team  e g  website development and visual merchandising   translating your findings into commercial actions that add value to the business This is a great opportunity if you want to be in control of the data stream from start to end  You will be taking care of tracking implementations  running A B tests and analyses  and presenting your ideas to deliver value Are you the Data Analyst that likes to work in a young  energetic  informal  international and sporty environment  Then we are looking for you TasksThe job  As our Data Analyst you will track and analyze all commercial data streams for our O Neill website  with the aim to provide the E Commerce team with commercial insights that add value to the business Key accountabilities  You support the right business decision making by  Creating and implementing measurement plans to measure all digital activity and track the right KPIs Formulating and validating hypotheses through A B testing Sharing results and findings to key stakeholders in an understandable way  e g  through dashboards  Prioritizing business opportunities based on their commercial impact You analyze traffic  sales data and consumer behavior to provide insights  such that Tracking scripts are working correctly  Google Analytics 360  Facebook Pixel  etc  Data streams are connected to create a 360 degrees view of our customers Commercial opportunities are identified  e g  buying patterns  audience definitions  etc  Genuine processes  such as reporting  are highly automated Data is being collected in a GDPR compliant way External parties and agencies are managed and involved RequirementsWho are you We are looking for an energetic and well organized Data Analyst with a passion for technology  fashion and sports and with 2 5 years relevant work experience Further  you preferably have  Bachelor s degree in E Commerce or IT Experience managing large datasets and setting up dashboards  e g  Google Data Studio  Experience with Google Analytics and Tag Manager Proficient with A B testing software  e g  Google Optimize   Optimizely Proficiency with BigQuery and customer data platforms is a plus Strong English skills  in writing and speaking  You have both a strong commercially driven attitude as a numerical analytical mind  With qualities such as result oriented  customer knowledge  market knowledge and analytical skills you can show your added value within the E Commerce team BenefitsWhat do we offer A challenging position in an international  dynamic and young environmentShort communication lines and a creative place to workHealth   Wellbeing program  for example HIIT   Yoga opportunities in the officeMonday Morning Moment which include a nice breakfastYour own department fish in our O Neill aquarium25  staff discountPlease send in your resume and motivation letter by using the apply button below Whom will you work for O Neill  the original California surf  snow and lifestyle brand  was founded in 1952 when a young man named Jack O Neill took his unstoppable passion for surfing and used it to battle Mother Nature by inventing the wetsuit  He  just wanted to surf longer   Jack s initial vision of producing functional and innovative board riding products continues to lie at the core of everything the company does  Even today  our collection of casual  swim and active wear is inspired by our love for the ocean Job Type  Full time

Wat ga je doen  Als data analist genereer je kennis en daarmee waarde uit data  Je helpt mee om vanuit jouw kennis het data gedreven werken in de organisatie te introduceren  Met belanghebbenden door de hele organisatie identificeer je de behoefte en worden specifieke datavraagstukken geformuleerd  Je werkt nauw samen met de product owner  Je werkt met SQL en Python  ontsluit data uit verschillende systemen en prepareert deze  Je vergaart informatie uit de dataset met behulp van statische methodes  zoals correlatie en regressieanalyses  Je communiceert de resultaten met de belanghebbenden en visualiseert data voor hen in bijvoorbeeld Power BI  Ook schrijf je eindrapportages en maak je je eigen werkschema s  De functie van data analist is relatief nieuw binnen Cardia en initieel zal deze voor de periode van 1 jaar worden ingevuld  Echter zijn wij een groeiende organisatie en bij succes is het zeker mogelijk dat deze functie uiteindelijk blijvend zal zijn  Wij bieden Een plezierige werksfeer waar aan collegialiteit veel waarde wordt gehecht  In deze tijden spreekt het voor zich dat wij ook goede voorzieningen hebben om thuis te werken   De functie is nieuw en wordt derhalve momenteel beschreven en gewogen  een definitieve inschaling volgt zo spoedig mogelijk  Verwachting is echter dat deze ingeschaald zal worden in FWG50 met een maximum bruto maandloon van  3818 87 op basis van een 36 urige werkweek   Onze secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden hebben wij in samenspraak met onze medewerkers uitgebreid  Naast de collectieve korting op diverse verzekeringen hebben wij nu ook een fietsplan  sport  of fitnessabonnement regeling  computer laptopplan en een bonusregeling wanneer je een nieuwe collega aanbrengt   Je krijgt in beginsel één of meerdere tijdelijke contracten voor de totale duur van 2 jaar  Bij succes is verlenging een optie  Wat we zoeken Kennis  ervaring en deskundigheid Je hebt een opleiding afgerond op WO niveau richting statistiek  Voorts heb je enkele jaren praktijkervaring met het analyseren van bedrijfsprocessen  Je hebt kennis van en ervaring met Power bi  SQL en Python  Persoonskenmerken Als data analist weet je waar je het over hebt  de data weet je moeiteloos naar de  zorginhoudelijke  vragen uit de organisatie te vertalen  Je bent resultaatgericht en kan communiceren op alle niveaus binnen en buiten de organisatie  Je bent discreet en kan met gevoelige  cliënt informatie omgaan  Je bent deskundig en werkt met plezier en bezieling  Enthousiast geworden  Ben je enthousiast geworden en herken je jezelf in het profiel  Klik dan op onderstaande knop om je motivatiebrief en CV te versturen  De sollicitatieprocedure omvat naast gesprekken een meeloopochtend  Zo kun je sfeer proeven in het team waar je wellicht komt te werken  Wij hechten veel waarde aan hoe jij als mens past bij de cliënten en collega s van de afdeling  Op deze manier kunnen we van beide kanten een weloverwogen beslissing nemen  Voor aanvullende informatie kun je contact opnemen met Projectmanager Marieke Thoen op telefoonnummer 070   8008400 of mthoen cardia nl  Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld   De gesprekken zullen plaatsvinden op maandag 14 maart 2022 De sluitingsdatum van deze vacature is 24 maart 2022

Do you want to work on deploying a platform that aims to reduce carbon emissions   We are seeking a Data Scientist who has a background in the energy sector to join a growing scale up that is playing a vital role in reducing carbon emissions in the energy sector  Industry  Development Energy Machine Learning Sustainability What to expect  You will be performing research and analysis on complex and varied data sources  blending data sets to create insights for example IoT data and satellite data to name a few  Work with a cutting edge stack to develop  deploy  build and test predictive models using machine learning and advanced statistics  with a strong emphasis on the latter  This is a diverse role requiring skills from software development to applied mathematics and statistics  This role will report to the Chief Data Scientist  Perks  Have huge impact and scope in your role Fewer restrictions on what methods you use  lots of autonomy Lots of space for creativity   it s encouraged Fully remote role  must be based in Netherlands Requirements  3  years minimum as Data Scientist Strong programming skills in Python  Experience with JavaScript is a plus Experience with Python  data science and machine learning ecosystem including NumPy  Pandas  Jupyter  SciPy  Scikit Learn Previous experience performing data analysis in oil   gas or climate science applications would be viewed favorable

job_desc: Wij zoeken jou als Data Scientist Voor ons Strategy  Data   Intelligence  SDI  team bij Transavia zijn wij op zoek naar een Data Scientist  Dit team leidt de transformatie naar het data gedreven werken  adviseert afdelingen aan de hand van informatie en inzichten  en bouwt aan data  en AI oplossingen voor klanten en medewerkers van Transavia  Het team is opgericht om Transavia naar een hoger niveau te brengen in Data   Analytics  Als Data Scientist ontwikkel je een brede range aan advanced analytics en ML AI oplossingen  van recommenders tot forecasting modellen en decision support tools  Heb jij een passie voor slimme modellen en optimalisatie strategieën  Ben jij gedreven om de business nog slimmer te laten werken en klanten beter te servicen met advanced analytics en ML AI oplossingen  Dan ben jij mogelijk de Data Scientist naar wie wij op zoek zijn   Wat ga je doen   Je werkt aan AI  Machine Learning en Optimization oplossingen voor de verschillende domeinen binnen Transavia  Denk aan marketing   sales  revenue management  planning   scheduling  technische dienst  het operations control center  etc  Samen met een Data Analyst en of Engineer vertaal je de doelstellingen van het AI ML product door in data  kwaliteits vereisten en een opzet voor het experiment prototype of nieuwe release  Samen met de Data Engineers werk je aan de data en machine learning pipelines om het model in productie te kunnen zetten in onze Microsoft Azure cloud omgeving  De resultaten deel je  tussentijds  middels visuals en dashboards  Met andere woorden  je werkt aan de AI ML oplossingen van begin tot eind  van concept  ontwikkeling en implementatie tot beheer en monitoring van de tools in productie  van MVP prototype tot verschillende opvolgende releases  Zo optimaliseren we flight schedules  automatiseren we real time aanbevelingen voor klanten  forecasten we de benodigde crew standby en call center bezetting of bedenken we hoe we ons netwerk en vluchtschema kunnen optimaliseren  Je zal onderdeel uitmaken van het Strategy  Data   Intelligence  SDI  team dat naast Data Scientists bestaat uit de Lead SDI  Lead Data Scientist  Analytics Translators  Data Engineers  Data Analysts en Business Consultants  Je zal veel samenwerken met jouw SDI collega s  de business en onze  data  collega s bij Transavia Frankrijk Wie ben jij  Je herkent je in onze waarden daadkrachtig  bevlogen  verantwoordelijk en vriendelijk  én je hebt dat  tikkeltje lef  Je hebt een wo diploma in een business analytics  econometrie   toegepaste  wiskunde of een andere data science gerelateerde studie en minimaal 5 jaar relevante ervaring in een data science positie Je bent beschikbaar voor minimaal 32 uur per week Spreek je de Nederlandse taal nog niet zo goed als dat je zou willen  Maar spreek je wel uitstekend Engels  Dan zijn wij ook zeker geïnteresseerd in jou  Als Data Scientist  Heb je data science kennis  vanuit zowel de theorie als praktijk  op het gebied van advanced analytics  machine learning  operations research  statistics  data visualization  software engineering  model interpretation  etc  Gebruik je deze kennis om een probleem uit de business te vertalen naar een wiskundige en technische oplossing  Kun je problemen  maar ook kansen identificeren en begrijpen  Daarnaast ben je in staat om je data om te zetten in een concreet advies waar jij zelf  of het team  mee aan de slag kan  Ben je in staat om deze problemen om te zetten naar optimalisatie modellen en de juiste  scoring  metrics te gebruiken om de performance te evalueren  Heb je kennis van verschillende AI ML en OR best practices en ben je continu op zoek hoe je de kwaliteit van onze producten kan verbeteren  en hoe dit breed in het team toegepast kan worden   Heb je ervaring met Python en veelgebruikte packages  bijv  Pandas  Numpy  Scikit learn  Keras  Tensorflow  Pyspark  etc   of soortgelijke programmeertalen en de ambitie om Python te leren  Kun je goed overweg met SQL  Git en CLI  Ervaring met Cloud en of MLops is een pré  Ben je bedreven in het gebruik van Pulp  Gurobi of vergelijkbare solvers  Werk je agile  Wat je ontdekt  pas je gelijk toe  Wat kan je van ons verwachten   Werken voor dé nummer 1 budgetluchtvaartmaatschappij  Vrijheid om je functie naar eigen inzicht vorm te geven  Veel ruimte en initiatieven voor persoonlijke ontwikkeling  22 verlof  en 4 adv dagen o b v  een fulltime dienstverband  Vriendelijke en bevlogen collega s  Last but not least  ben je reislustig  dan is onze IPB regeling  tegen mooie tarieven vliegen indien plaats beschikbaar  zeker de moeite waard  Deze functie is ingeschaald in een functiegroep 10 of 11  Afhankelijk van kennis en ervaring doen wij een aanbieding van tussen de 3 202   en 6 120   euro bruto per maand  Over Transavia Ons motto is   We make low cost feel good   We zetten daarbij graag een stap extra voor onze passagiers en voor elkaar  De sfeer in de organisatie kenmerkt zich door bevlogen medewerkers met een groen hart  Elke dag werken we met elkaar samen om een gemeenschappelijk doel te behalen  een memorabele klantbeleving   Transavia is een dynamische organisatie  never a dull moment  die continu probeert bij te blijven in een veranderende luchtvaartwereld  Wil jij graag werken in een omgeving met enthousiaste daadkrachtig collega s die oog hebben voor elkaar  Krijg je energie van verandering en vernieuwing en voel jij je het prettigst in een omgeving waar je regisseur bent van je eigen werk  Dan komen we graag met jou in contact  Is deze functie jou op het lijf geschreven en wil je solliciteren  Ben jij de Data Scientist die wij zoeken en kom je ons team versterken  Solliciteer dan direct via onderstaande button  Heb je vragen over deze vacature  Neem dan contact op ons via recruitment transavia com  Werk je bij een bureau en wil je een kandidaat voorstellen voor deze vacature als Data Scientist bij Transavia  Bedankt  maar hier gaan we niet op in  We werven onze nieuwe collega graag zelf

deliverables  and work as part of the development team towards a successful result  You will perform exploratory data analysis  identify and perform data quality checks  and are able to communicate findings clearly to the relevant stakeholders in the organization  Top 100 food company Every day 100 million consumers worldwide eat a meal with a little bit of Vion  This quantity comes with a big responsibility  At Vion we work passionately every day on the global food challenge  feeding 9 billion people in 2050  How can you contribute to this  The main responsibilities of the role can be Management in the field of BI process improvements and data quality  you perform exploratory data analysis  you will identify and perform data validation and communicate the findings to the relevant stakeholders to improve business processes What do we expect from you  you have a Master s degree in IT or technical subject  you have a minimum 3 years of experience with business analysis and data strong communication skills both verbal and written and fluent in Dutch and English  strong analytical skills  you are able to structure and solve both conceptual and concrete problems  pro active  pragmatic  customer oriented  hands on mentality with regards to data  team player with good social skills  What can you expect from us  In our company you will have an attractive  versatile and permanent position  with proven suitability  within a leading international food company  with around 12 400 employees worldwide  innovative market concepts and clear core values  You will be able to dure medicijnen en er wordt een groter beroep gedaan op de langdurige zorg  Het Zorginstituut waakt erover dat onze zorg goed en betaalbaar is én blijft  Dit alles om ons geld voor de zorg alleen te daarbij belangrijke pijlers  Het Zorginstituut is een zelfstandig bestuursorgaan  ZBO  en legt verantwoording af aan de minister VWS  Er werken ongeveer 450 mensen vanuit huis én vanuit ons mooie kantoor in Diemen  Zorginstituut Nederland

job_desc: As our Data Analyst  you are responsible for making Helloprint a more data driven company where data is used to drive action in every team  every day  Depending on the team you will join  you will improve daily decision making and build automations using data  work on  and execute our Pricing strategies  or are responsible for managing the product   carrier data of the European network behind our large and fast growing product portfolio  In every team  we have a big amount of data at our fingertips with over 1 000 product groups  10 million product combinations  200 global and local carrier options  300 production partners  and active business in 13 countries At Helloprint we are looking for a Junior Medior Data Analyst for 3 teams  Data Analytics team  You make business results measurable and know how to get the insights needed to take action  You help team members of other departments to specify their goals and translate them into KPIs and data requirements  By using your knowledge of SQL  Python  and R to perform analyses and act based on that data  You are a strategic thinker  but not afraid of picking up the trash yourself either  You are proactive in identifying opportunities  starting projects with business teams across Helloprint  You are able to clearly communicate complex  technical topics in a way that s understandable and shows clear suggestions for the next actions  Pricing team As Helloprint s Pricing Data Analyst  you are responsible for the commercial execution of our pricing strategies  Based on your research and analyses you are responsible for the optimization of our pricing models  This will be a very challenging job  our business is in 13 countries and we have over 10 million unique products that require pricing  You know all the in s and out s of the pricing business and you will make sure our product offering always has the most competitive pricing  You have the vision  where do we go with our pricing strategies  How can we improve our margins  Supply Data team  As a Data Analyst within the Supply Data team  you re responsible for managing the product   carrier data of the European network behind our large and fast growing product portfolio together with the team  With over 1 000 product groups  10 million product combinations  200 global and local carrier options  and 300 production partners  this is a huge amount of data  Retrieving  translating  and mapping data to our platform standard from any source or automation of data related processes using Python and or Alteryx is something you feel comfortable with based on your knowledge and skills  On top of taking you are given the responsibility to take the lead in certain projects from the get go given your experience  Does this make your eyes grow bigger  your hands start to itch  and do you feel the desire to make an impact and create fast growth  Look no more  This is the place for you  Are you ready for this  What we are looking for 1 2 years  Junior level  or 2 4 years  Medior level  of experience in data analytics  A Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science  Mathematics  Economics  Engineering  Operations Research  Statistics  Business or other related technical disciplines  Master s Degree is a plus   Excellent analytical skills  SQL   Python or R highly preferred   Advanced experience with Excel  For the role in the Data team  experience in website tracking  Google Analytics  Google Tag Manager  Segment  Snowplow or similar tools  and data orchestration tools  Airflow  dbt   Experience with Alteryx is a plus  Experience with working on strategic challenges and collaborating with management level stakeholders  A strong commercial mindset  you see opportunities and make sure we act on them  Experience in a scale up and e commerce setting is a plus  What we offer Attractive salary and bonus structure  Stock Option Program possibility after six months  A unique challenge at a fast growing European e commerce company  Smart and highly driven co workers who work on big challenges and a big dream  A fast paced learning curve and opportunities to grow and develop yourself in an environment where freedom and responsibility are central  An unique culture with 32 nationalities and with an average age of 30  Opportunities to grow  even into our Leadership Team  We don t look for age or background  if you are extremely good  you will grow quickly  Great office locations  In The Netherlands  Rotterdam on the Witte de Withstraat  just 5 minutes from Rotterdam Central Station  in Valencia  Spain in the heart of the city Center  You can work in both locations  Breakfast  lunch and dinner on us  Enough to keep you going all day  24 7 access to our HelloFit gym More about Helloprint  Helloprint is the number one marketplace for customized print products  We bring local production and delivery to a global audience of creative entrepreneurs  SMBs and e commerce companies  reducing cost  speed of delivery and carbon footprint  What differs Helloprint  is our 200  team from 32 countries  all working in an entrepreneurial culture where freedom and responsibility are leading to high performance  We are job_desc: Hunt   Hackett helps European companies prevent  detect and respond to today s most advanced adversaries  safeguarding them against cyberthreats and espionage  We don t stir a bit into security strategies  our talented team of responsible rebels shakes them up to build  operate and maintain digital immune systems for our customers to outsmart their digital adversaries   To extend our multidisciplinary team we are now hiring Data scientist   Developer  Are you thorough by default and pragmatic when needed  Do you like to explain to your friends how your piece of code found the Russian adversary in the terabytes of event data  You know that Pandas are more than just black  and white coloured fluffy animals  Do you belong to the most talented group of data scientist and   or developers in the industry   or is this where you plan to be  Then Hunt   Hackett might be your next best step   Data Scientist at Hunt   Hackett  Data science is a core competency and focus within Hunt   Hackett and not just an ingredient of our marketing storyline  We believe that modern cyber security and catching bad guys requires data science in order to build  operate and maintain a digital immune system  This gives the power to our clients to safeguard their organization against cyber attacks  To do this we collect  big data and use our tradecraft to create  real time  insights that guide our actions in order to secure our customers   Hunt   Hackett is currently in start up phase  This means that you work highly independently and no one needs to explain to you what needs to be done  You have experience with properly processing large amounts of data and developing code around this  You do this by applying the latest software development and architectural paradigms  which ultimately gives you warm and fuzzy feelings  Your standard modus operandi is developing robust  high quality  reusable and production level source code  However  you have a pragmatic attitude as well and nothing is stopping you if you are in a situation that requires direct patching code in a production environment   You have architectural capabilities and like to glue things together  ranging from internal business processes to individual systems  applications and API s  In practice this means that next to your innovative projects  you support internal processes related to Incident Response  Threat Intelligence and our Cyber Defense Center   Furthermore  you might be interested in Hunt   Hackett because you like the company name  or having an office close to the beach  However  we are not yet another company and we would like to see that next to your passion for data science and software development  you have an interest as well in finding bad stuff and contributing to safeguarding our society   Hunt   Hackett is not yet another security company and we expect our employees to match that  We are looking for data science and software development passion  but expect you to have a strong interest in finding bad stuff and making society more secure as well   The Hunt   Hackett wish list  The right candidate The opportunity to safeguard Europe s leading organizations  Is able to demonstrate their experience by showing their source code and or projects worked on   showyourgithub An aspiration to fulfill a role as an expert architect on technical projects  Preferred development language experience in Python and JavaScript  Experience with Pandas  Scikit learn and Spark or similar tools and techniques  Experience with Cloud services in AWS  GCP  Azure and cloud tools like Google Big Query   What is your wish list  As a minimum  Hunt   Hackett offers you The opportunity to safeguard Europe s leading organizations  A unique culture of  responsible rebellion  where you can learn from the best to get the most out of yourself  The most innovative security tools you need to get the job done  Plenty of time and opportunity to develop yourself with regards to SOC  IR  Red Teaming etc   A proper laptop and phone to get the job done  A modern pension  which is transparent and can be controlled by yourself  Employee share participation scheme  Compensation for your travel costs   A culture of  responsible rebellion   Only  very  talented  multidisciplinary teams of threat hunters  intelligence analysts  reverse engineers  data scientists  developers and hackers are able to outsmart the increasingly professional community of cyber attackers  We pride ourselves as a force for the good and as such we think and act as responsible rebels  We are not  just another security company   and our people are not  just employees   Everyone at Hunt   Hackett wants to be the best in their field and focusses at delivering next gen levels of service  This means that we  Push the envelope  Everyone at our teams takes the responsibility to make our work better every day  by being creative to color outside of the lines if needed  Help you to become the best version of yourself  We bring together the best minds in the field  to inspire each other and to learn from each other  Personal development and growth are important to us and our customers  Build mission driven teams  We believe in the power of small teams who can focus on strategic tasks  not on repetitive work that can be automated  It s up to you to make this happen  Believe that God is in the details  Tiny details can have a huge impact  especially in security  This is why we champion tradecraft  We are system thinkers that oversee the big picture but who are simultaneously obsessive about the details Are Responsible Rebels  We are polite  We are courteous  We show professionalism  For more information or to apply  send an email to info huntandhackett com

Vacatures Data Analyst   Platform P L management  EN  Financial analytical powerhouse dedicated to seize improvement opportunities Opleidingsniveau Bachelor Werkervaring 1 4   4 7 jaar locatie Utrecht Vacatures 4 000   5 500 Solliciteer direct Solliciteren Deel Esther Kuipers Recruiter Stel mij een vraag  Direct naar  How do you make our customers happy  Bol com is spearheading the network economy revolution  By now  over 48 000 partners do business on our platform  We make an effort to support our partners  ranging from startups to experienced e tailers  in a thousand different ways  The smarter they can do business  the happier our customers are  As Data Analyst Platform P L Management  you work on the cutting edge between finance and platform strategy  always within arm s reach of the commercial operation  Your in depth and innovative financial data insights help us to make better business decisions  Decisions that enable us to take our platform proposition to continuously higher levels for our partners and customers  Can you scrutinize raw financial data and translate  abstract  analytical insights into actionable business recommendations  Welcome aboard   What you do as Data Analyst   Platform P L Management Bol com is a full fledged retail tech platform that offers multiple  partner  propositions  Our partners can sell to an audience of millions  take advantage of attractive digital advertising options  in shopping   and trust on our  logistics as a service  solutions  such as  Logistiek via bol com  and  Verzenden via bol com   This necessitates commercial tradeoffs  How can we optimize our investment across these different propositions  What has the greatest return on investment  How can we use data insights to inform these decisions  And can you provide those data insights in a way that excites business stakeholders  Also  can you demonstrate that the right choices were made after the fact   In this role  you work closely with colleagues from business control and relevant business teams to help realize the strategic Platform agenda  You need to have a strong affinity for financial management  you are constantly deep diving into the financial data to discover new opportunities to improve the top and bottom lines in our P L statements  This often involves scrutinizing expenses and translating actionable insights into compelling improvement proposals  But those plans are just the beginning  Maximize your impact by converting your  wild  plans into quantifiable results  Again  in collaboration with the relevant business teams  And considering how many teams we have  the role also necessitates an ability  and drive  to work with constantly changing groups of colleagues   You discover innovative and in depth financial insights and translate these into actionable insights with Google BigQuery  SQL  and Google DataStudio   Tableau You translate raw financial data into a new commercial perspective and recommend improvements  Even minor optimizations can have a large impact on customers and partners  You maximize our P L performance by taking the appropriate  data informed actions  in close collaboration with business teams  of note  both revenues and expenses are in scope  You facilitate investment decisions and help to shape  effective  financial planning frameworks in line with our strategic agenda You provide management with financial reports so it can  continue to  monitor investments You work together with business teams to quantify the impact of their decisions Why you can make the difference Because your data analytical shoulders are broad enough to shape this role  You get a kick out of translating financial data into actionable insights  and you have plenty of experience doing just that  You enjoy setting your own goals and structuring your own work processes  and initiating cross functional partnerships with different business teams  This role calls for a combination of financial and business analysis skills  in addition to solid project management qualities  Also essential  a talent for getting stakeholders on board  Even in situations that go against prevailing team goals and or ways of working  Persuading and influencing is key   3 redenen waarom dit  n iets voor jou is Laat zien waarom niet Laat zien waarom wel  You only process data No  if you only want to process data and think we should get someone else to handle project and stakeholder management  You re not into pioneering No  because what really killed the cat was acting on it s curiosity  You re a couple of years behind No  if your financial  P L  experience is rustier than a bike at the bottom of Utrecht s canal   Your track record speaks volumes Yes  if you bring a master s degree and 2 5 years of data analytical experience to the table   financial  data is your home away from home   You re a data glutton Yes  if you are an expert in SQL  BigQuery  and visualizing large quantities of  financial  data  for example  in DataStudio and or Tableau   You re bold Yes  if you have the guts to challenge the status quo to improve it and can do so constructively with the business teams involved This is where you ll work At the premier online retail tech platform in the Netherlands and Belgium  A platform where 13 million customers can choose from over 38 million products  A platform that helps roughly 48 000 commercial partners run their businesses  And a platform that will never be  finished   because bol com has been reinventing retail since 1999 and we always will be  If there s a better way to do something  we re working on it  Together with our customers  partners  and over 2 500 colleagues  And hopefully together with you    Wij creëren een omgeving waarin we de kracht van diversiteit benutten  De voordelen van een blauw hart Wat je nog meer krijgt De extra s Denk hierbij aan trainingen  een lekkere lunch  een telefoon en eventueel een leaseauto  wanneer dit nodig is voor het uitoefenen van je functie  Aan en uit Bij bol com snappen we als geen ander dat je eerst voor jezelf moet zorgen  dan voor je omgeving en dan voor bol com  In die volgorde  Daarom krijgt iedereen bij bol com 29 vakantiedagen  In de bonus Aan het eind van het jaar krijg je een bonus  en dat sluiten we altijd af met een leuk feestje  Sollicitatieproces Alles dat je moet weten over je job_desc: As our Data Analyst  you are responsible for making Helloprint a more data driven company where data is used to drive action in every team  every day  Depending on the team you will join  you will improve daily decision making and build automations using data  work on  and execute our Pricing strategies  or are responsible for managing the product   carrier data of the European network behind our large and fast growing product portfolio  In every team  we have a big amount of data at our fingertips with over 1 000 product groups  10 million product combinations  200 global and local carrier options  300 production partners  and active business in 13 countries At Helloprint we are looking for a Junior Medior Data Analyst for 3 teams  Data Analytics team  You make business results measurable and know how to get the insights needed to take action  You help team members of other departments to specify their goals and translate them into KPIs and data requirements  By using your knowledge of SQL  Python  and R to perform analyses and act based on that data  You are a strategic thinker  but not afraid of picking up the trash yourself either  You are proactive in identifying opportunities  starting projects with business teams across Helloprint  You are able to clearly communicate complex  technical topics in a way that s understandable and shows clear suggestions for the next actions  Pricing team As Helloprint s Pricing Data Analyst  you are responsible for the commercial execution of our pricing strategies  Based on your research and analyses you are responsible for the optimization of our pricing models  This will be a very challenging job  our business is in 13 countries and we have over 10 million unique products that require pricing  You know all the in s and out s of the pricing business and you will make sure our product offering always has the most competitive pricing  You have the vision  where do we go with our pricing strategies  How can we improve product portfolio together with the team  With over 1 000 product groups  10 million product combinations  200 global and local carrier options  and 300 production partners  this is a huge amount of data  Retrieving  translating  and mapping data to our platform standard from any source or automation of data related processes using Python and or Alteryx is something you feel comfortable with your hands start to itch  and do you feel the desire to make an impact and create fast growth  Look no more  This is the place for you  Are you ready for this  What we are looking for 1 2 years with working on strategic challenges and collaborating with management level stakeholders  A strong commercial mindset  you see opportunities and make sure we act on them  Experience in a scale up and job_desc: Hunt   Hackett helps European companies prevent  detect and respond to today s most advanced adversaries  safeguarding them against cyberthreats and espionage  We don t stir a bit into security strategies  our talented team of responsible rebels shakes them up to build  operate and maintain digital immune systems for our customers to outsmart their digital adversaries   To extend our multidisciplinary team we are now hiring Data scientist   Developer  Are you thorough by default and pragmatic when needed  Do you like to explain to your friends how your piece of code found the Russian adversary in the terabytes of event data  You know that Pandas are more than just black  and white coloured fluffy animals  Do you belong to the most talented group of data scientist and   or developers in the industry   or is this where you plan to be  Then Hunt   Hackett might be your next best step   Data Scientist at Hunt   Hackett  Data science is a core competency and focus within Hunt   Hackett and not just an ingredient of our marketing storyline  We believe that modern cyber security and catching bad guys requires data science in order to build  operate and maintain a digital immune system  This gives the power to our clients to safeguard their organization against cyber attacks  To do this we collect  big data and use our tradecraft to create  real time  insights that guide our actions in order to secure our customers   Hunt   Hackett is currently in start up phase  This means that you work highly independently and no one needs to explain to you what needs to be done  You have experience with properly processing large amounts of data and developing code around this  You do this by applying the latest software development and architectural paradigms  which ultimately gives you warm and fuzzy feelings  Your standard modus operandi is developing robust  high quality  reusable and production level source code  However  you have a pragmatic attitude as well and nothing is stopping you if you are in a situation that requires direct patching code in a production environment   You have architectural capabilities and like to glue things together  ranging from internal business processes to individual systems  applications and API s  In practice this means that next to your innovative projects  you support internal processes related to Incident Response  Threat Intelligence and our Cyber Defense Center   Furthermore  you might be interested in Hunt   Hackett because you like the company name  or having an office close to the beach  However  we are not yet another company and we would like to see that next to your passion for data science and software development  you have an interest as well in finding bad stuff and contributing to safeguarding our society   Hunt   Hackett is not yet another security company and we expect our employees to match that  We are looking for data science and software development passion  but expect  Azure and cloud tools like Google Big Query   What is your wish list  As a minimum  Hunt   Hackett offers you The opportunity to safeguard Europe s leading organizations  A unique culture of  responsible rebellion  where you can learn from the best to get the most out of yourself  The most innovative security tools you need to get the job done  Plenty of time and opportunity to develop yourself with regards to SOC  IR  Red Teaming etc   A proper laptop and phone to get the job done  A modern pension  which is transparent and can be controlled by yourself  Employee share participation scheme  Compensation for your travel costs   A culture of  responsible rebellion   Only  very  talented  multidisciplinary teams of threat hunters  intelligence analysts  reverse engineers  data scientists  developers and hackers are able to outsmart the increasingly professional community of cyber attackers  We pride ourselves as a force for the good and as such we think and are important to us and our customers  Build mission driven teams  We believe in the power of small teams who can focus on strategic tasks  not on repetitive work that can be automated  It s up to you to make this happen  Believe that God is in the details  Tiny details can have a huge impact  especially in security  This is why we champion tradecraft  We are system thinkers that oversee the big Vacatures 4 000   5 500 Solliciteer direct Solliciteren Deel Esther Kuipers Recruiter Stel mij een vraag  Direct naar  How do you make our customers happy  Bol com is spearheading the network economy revolution  By now  over 48 000 partners do business on our platform  We make an effort to support our partners  ranging from startups to experienced e tailers  in a thousand different ways  The smarter they can do business  the happier our customers are  As Data Analyst Platform P L Management  you work on the cutting edge between finance and platform strategy  always within arm s reach of the commercial operation  Your in depth and innovative financial data insights help us to make better business decisions  Decisions that enable us to take our platform proposition to continuously higher levels for our partners and customers  Can you scrutinize raw financial data and translate  abstract  analytical insights into actionable business recommendations  Welcome aboard   What you do as Data Analyst   Platform P L Management Bol com is a full fledged retail tech platform that offers multiple  partner  propositions  Our partners can sell to an audience of millions  take advantage of attractive digital advertising options  in shopping   and trust on our  logistics as a service  solutions  such as  Logistiek via bol com  and  Verzenden via bol com   This necessitates commercial tradeoffs  How can we optimize our investment across these different propositions  What has the greatest return on investment  How can we use data insights to inform these decisions  And can you provide those data insights in a way that excites business stakeholders  Also  can you demonstrate that the right choices were made after the fact   In this role  you work closely with colleagues from business control and relevant business teams to help realize the strategic Platform agenda  You need to have a strong affinity for financial management  you are constantly deep diving into the financial data to discover new opportunities to improve the top and bottom lines in our P L statements  This often involves scrutinizing expenses and translating actionable insights into compelling improvement proposals  But those plans are just the beginning  Maximize your impact by converting your  wild  plans into quantifiable results  Again  in collaboration with the relevant business teams  And considering how many teams we have  the role also necessitates an ability  and drive  to work with constantly changing groups of colleagues   You discover innovative and in depth financial insights and translate these into actionable insights with Google BigQuery  SQL  and Google DataStudio   Tableau You translate raw financial data into a new commercial perspective and recommend improvements  Even minor optimizations can have a large impact on customers and partners  You maximize our P L performance by taking the appropriate  data informed actions  in close collaboration with business teams  of note  both revenues and expenses are in scope  You facilitate investment decisions and help to shape  effective  financial planning frameworks in line with our strategic agenda You provide management with financial reports so it can  continue to  monitor investments You work together with business teams to quantify the impact of their decisions Why you can make the difference Because your data analytical shoulders are broad enough to shape this role  You get a kick out of translating financial data into actionable insights  and you have plenty of experience doing just that  You enjoy setting your own goals and structuring your own work processes  and initiating cross functional partnerships with different business teams  This role calls for a combination of financial and business analysis skills  in addition to solid project management qualities  Also essential  a talent for getting stakeholders on board  Even in situations that go against prevailing team goals and or ways of working  Persuading and influencing is key   3 redenen waarom dit  n iets voor jou is Laat zien waarom niet Laat zien waarom wel  You only process data No  if you only want to process data and think we should get someone else to handle project and stakeholder management  You re not into pioneering No  because what really killed the cat was acting on it s curiosity  You re a couple of years behind No  if your financial  P L  experience is rustier than a bike at the bottom of Utrecht s canal   Your track record speaks volumes Yes  if you bring a master s degree and 2 5 years of data analytical experience to the table   financial  data is your home away from home   You re a data glutton Yes  if you are an expert in SQL  BigQuery  and visualizing large quantities of  financial  data  for example  in DataStudio and or Tableau   You re bold Yes  if you have the guts to challenge the status quo to improve it and can do so constructively with the business teams involved This is where you ll work At the premier online retail tech platform in the Netherlands and Belgium  A platform where 13 million customers can choose from over 38 million products  A platform that helps roughly 48 000 commercial partners run their businesses  And a platform that will never be  finished   because bol com has been reinventing retail since 1999 and we always will be  If there s a better way to do something  we re working on it  Together with our customers  partners  and over 2 500 colleagues  And hopefully together with you    Wij creëren een omgeving waarin we de kracht van job_desc: Want to do cool shit with amazing data to make an impact in a tech lagging industry  Would you like to join a fast growing B2B SaaS company that is revolutionizing the manufacturing industry by empowering factory workers whilst saving paper at the same time  Fresh from announcing a further  5 million of funding in March  we are now searching for our first ever Data Analyst  Working with our Founders  CTO  the Product Circle  Customer Success  well  basically  the whole company  you will take ownership of data analytics at SwipeGuide  Your mission  Empower SwipeGuide with data driven insights on the product  business  and customer to scale adoption and usage and help us make the right decisions  You ll manage the overall data architecture and develop  prioritize and recommend initiatives to improve and build upon the data architecture to support SwipeGuide  WHO ARE WE  We are SwipeGuide  We are on a mission to reduce waste  spare resources for better use  and save the world from useless paper instructions  Imagine working on a busy production line  and you have to rely upon outdated  inadequate work instructions  PDF and paper instructions are a thing of the past  so we re developing simple  intuitive cloud software to empower factory teams to perform better in their jobs and scale knowledge with digital standard work  Our SwipeGuide platform enables global companies like Coca Cola  Heineken  and PepsiCo to build and share visual step by step digital work instructions with their workforce on any device  And yes  it also feels good to enable them to use less paper and save the trees  We all know that a digital future is unavoidable  and we re providing the software essential for digital transformation  And it s working  We started with five people in 2016  today  after  5mn funding in March 2021  we have twenty five full time employees  100 000  platform users in 89 countries worldwide  and an inclusive  continuously improving culture  OUR TEAM OF SWIPEES We have recently become a part remote organization  but our office is preserved for 10 Swipees to attend each day  totally optional   For the future  it s totally up to you  hammock on the beach or face to face smiles  We work in a bustling startup hub B 2 in Amsterdam with 300  other startups  You ll see the usual ping pong table  foosball  arcade machines  and PS4s everywhere  But  there are also charming places to sit in the sun  break out areas  and ambitious  inspired people as far as the eye can see  when everyone returns    You ll soon meet the road cyclist  the yoga lover  the guy with an oyster business  the ex chef  the person to count on in an emergency  the social butterfly  the DJ trainee  the volleyball player  and someone who owns hundreds of sneakers  We like to fail  it s how we learn   and in our PowWow  we share our f    ups  failures  and learn together  Our values are at the heart of everything we do  we strive to enable Swipees to develop their potential and showcase their authentic selves and engage in a culture of inclusion YOUR ROLE AS THE DATA ANALYST AT SWIPEGUIDE Currently  we gather a lot of valuable content data  such as the number of guides created  published  viewed and more  We have built our own event tracking service with AWS Lambda and store our own analytics data in AWS Redshift and AWS RDS  From these data sources  ETL scripts  and an aggregation pipeline  we build and embed dashboards for customers with Sisense  a third party dashboarding tool  As the first ever Data Analyst at SwipeGuide  you will work closely with Sue  CTO   Daan  Founder CPO   Willemijn  Founder CEO   and a small team of Data Engineers to build  maintain  and troubleshoot data reports used by the company and our customers  This can mean everything from creating new charts based on the data architecture and tooling we currently have to transform our data strategy completely  You have the freedom and power to OWN IT  The challenge  Self Service  We are storing immense amounts of data but all of those insights are trapped inside of our tables in several databases  How can we make it easy to access and visualize that data  Can we enable non developers to get those insights themselves  Maintenance  With ever changing requirements from customers about the business about what they want to know  and ever changing features in the platform  we need to keep up and make sure the data and reports are up to date and accurate  Performance  Sisense offers customers the ability to filter views of graphs and tables based on date  and we need to keep the historical data to show adoption over time  How can we optimize our queries and data structures to do this in the most performant way possible  Cross platform experience  How can we combine and organize data from users on the web based CMS and Viewers  but also our NativeApps   Your responsibilities  Given the size of our team and demands from our customers  you ll be working on both operational and strategic levels  That means  on the one hand  you should be comfortable with data analysis  creating charts  and SQL scripts yourself  and on the other hand  you will use your broad experience and expertise to advise on what data to collect and store  how to do model and maintain it  and what tools we should use and implement  A day in the life of the Data Analyst could look like this  Defining the strategy for Data Architecture at SwipeGuide Create initiatives and develop priorities to improve upon our Data Architecture Defining and implementing new event tracking Developing reports and analysis to support SwipeGuide with decision making Analyzing existing tools and databases and providing software solution recommendations Providing technical expertise in data storage structures  data mining  and data cleansing Design and develop large and complex data warehouse architectures Take ownership of large production data systems to support a variety of growing data needs Design  implement and expand data pipelines by performing preprocessing  cleaning and monitoring activities Growing the future Data Circle with the support you need to scale ESSENTIAL ATTRIBUTES FOR THE DATA ANALYST At least 5 years of experience as a data analyst  business analyst  BI analyst  or related role  Experience with Data strategy for a young tech SaaS company Expert in writing and debugging SQL queries Experience in handling large data sets with relational databases  ex  AWS RDS  and non relational databases  ex  AWS Redshift  Demonstrated experience working with power BI tools such as Looker  Tableau  Sisense  or similar  can you walk us through a chart you created   You know what a  materialized view  and  ETL script  is Able to translate complex requirements into non technical  lay terms  Able to work independently and make decisions and manage priorities in a fast paced startup environment  Organized and structured way of working  Fast learner with a growth mindset Fluent in English NICE TO HAVES TO BE SWIPEGUIDES DATA ANALYST  Experience working with Node js or Python Basic JavaScript and bash scripting experience  for updating data scripts in our web application  Experience working with AWS and its additional data related services  ex  Snowflake  Glue  etc    we have a ton of free credits to experiment with until March 2022   Interest in machine learning  AI  etc  WHAT S IN IT FOR YOU  Unlimited holidays  and we think it works here    In office smiles or Zoom meets  up to you  Full Remote working opportunities   Amsterdam office   Competitive monthly compensation   monthly holiday pay  A challenging environment to develop your personal and professional skills with a lot of freedom to take on ownership  You ll be in a fortunate situation to make a high impact at a startup that is about to lift off after  5mn funding  You will enjoy working in a startup hub at B  Amsterdam  A chance to learn from other people s mistakes   we share and celebrate failures each week WHAT ARE YOUR FUTURE COLLEAGUES SAYING ABOUT SWIPEGUIDE   I love the atmosphere of collaboration  It really feels like everyone here cares about our product and genuinely wants it to grow and succeed  That s a healthy kind of place to work     Chris Content Marketer  SwipeGuide gives me hands on experience in how to build a company from scratch alongside really passionate people  The gap between who I am and who I wanna be as a professional gets smaller every day here  and that s what defines a good workplace for me     Ingrid  Customer Success Specialist  SwipeGuide is committed to creating a diverse environment influenced by a lifetime of individual experiences  We hire people from all walks of life  not just because it s the right thing to do  but also because when people from diverse backgrounds build a company  the understanding and embracing of their communities grow exponentially  This means our creative and strategic horizons are not only expanding  but they re consistently strengthening  thanks to a global perspective  Therefore  we make a constant effort to follow the right practices and processes so that we do not discriminate based on education  race  religion  colour  national origin  genetics  gender  gender identity  sexual orientation  age  marital status  veteran status  or disability status  Could you see yourself in a similar position  but not this one  We are open to changing this position to suit your skillset  Apply then email ben swipeguide com    we are open to new ideas for this position

job_desc: Data analyst planning and forecasting As Data analyst planning and forecasting you help companies make better forecasting  planning and inventory management decisions  based on quantitative analysis and models  You are a creative mind with a passion for planning  both the technology and the reality of business  You are keen to translate data science outcomes into business impact   Your role as Data analyst planning and forecasting  In your work  you deal with the three pillars of applied analytics  data engineering  model development and storytelling  You keep a sharp analytical eye on both the business challenges and the hard data science   Your activities are a mix between shorter customer projects  4 6 weeks   internal developments  and longer  interim  activities  3 6 months  at selected customers  This provides unique opportunities to learn about and work with the latest data science insights around forecasting  inventory management  and other aspects of planning  as well as great experiences being immersed in the reality of business   At EyeOn you will work with the latest techniques  solutions and insights in the field of planning and forecasting  As believers in the future where data is the core and most decisions are made by machines  we are constantly developing ourselves and the techniques and methods we work with  We challenge you to do the same   Your primary work location will be at our customer locations and our office in Aarle Rixtel  where our forecasting   planning knowledge center is located  We also have offices in Amsterdam  Antwerp  Geneva  Zürich  Dublin  Düsseldorf  and New York City   Responsibilities Translating planning challenges into data science solutions  In interim projects  helping customers with their challenges in any way needed  creating ad hoc analyses  providing insightful dashboards  developing their in house data science knowledge  etc  Contribute to the innovative power of EyeOn by running applied analytics lab projects  Raising the expertise of EyeOn colleagues in the area of applied analytics  Preferred requirements A completed university education and master degree in operations research  data science  econometrics  mathematics or similar  Relevant experience in or affinity with supply chain planning and forecasting processes  You enjoy translating complex practical problems into mathematical models  Experience with programming  preferably in Python  Numpy  Pandas  Scipy  Scikit learn   Experience with processing and analyzing data  eg  SQL  Hadoop  Spark  Kubernetes  is a plus  Knowledge of  and experience with typical data science techniques  eg  time series  regression  classification  clustering  math programming  simulation  etc  EU working permit  Working location  Eindhoven  EyeOn Data Science  In EyeOn Data Science we re the best at helping our customers do better supply chain planning through data science  We make sure we stay the best by working together as a team  and by learning new things from each other and through our customer projects   We re a young team with a passion for data science  using tools such as Dataiku  Python  pandas  numpy   Spark  PowerBI  Tableau  Jira  Bitbucket  and more  We are creative minds with a fascination for data  We believe in the digital transformation and a data driven future  Why work for EyeOn  Join a global team with experienced experts who are passionate about supply chain planning and data science  Co create solutions with creativity and innovation to solve tough business challenges for some of the world s largest and most successful companies  Work in a culture that blends the best entrepreneurial spirit with a healthy work life balance  Experience the freedom of deciding how you schedule your agenda  work and location in teams that operate with trust and autonomy  Create your own personal development program with the counsel of our experienced experts and support from EyeOn  Receive excellent Description About Cleeng Cleeng is the Subscriber Retention Management  SRM  Company  We help our clients create a long life relationship with their subscribers by providing the best operational tools as well as predictive analytics  Our solutions are used by market leading brands like Sinclair Broadcast Group  CBC  Broadway HD  BigTenNetwork  McFit  and many others  Cleeng s fully SaaS solution is built for scalability  flexibility  robustness and innovation  Working at Cleeng is rewarding  fun  and challenging  We thrive on innovation  If you want to join a fast growing business and make a real contribution  come join our team and help shape the future of video consumption  Your Mission Your mission is to architect and manage Cleeng infrastructure  supporting the strong growth of our transactional and analytical products  Our 10 year old platform is highly scalable  able to process millions of transactions per hour and analyze TBs of data  and proven throughout our 11 year history  working for top tier PPV events as well as large subscription platforms  We are fast growing  subscriber and data processing doubles every year   and need someone who can lead the team and the infrastructure to the next level  Position Overview As a VP of Infrastructure and Data  you will lead and run a team of DevOps  DataOps and Data Analysts  We see your role as crucial for our future growth  Partnering with other development teams  you will maintain the technical architecture  build a technical strategy and then execute it  Your objective will be to make our platform more scalable  flexible and automated  Working very closely with the CTO and other company leaders  the function can further grow into a more strategic function of the organization  Responsibilities Define technical vision  strategy  and guiding principles for Cleeng transactional infrastructure and data platform  Lead the Infrastructure   Data team  currently 5 FTE  and continue to build and cultivate a world class solution and team  Partner with BI  Backend and Frontend teams  to align the infrastructure requirements  as well as provide leadership and governance  Be an effective spokesperson and champion for the Infrastructure   Data development team and Cleeng main stakeholders  internal or external   Work in a high pace environment and be able to act independently  Must Have Requirements 5  to 10 years experience in a similar position in a large tech organization Proven successful experience in leading and managing infrastructure teams working on AWS platform  Good understanding of how complex  modern infrastructures are built and managed   combining distributed serverless platforms with modular monolithic architecture  Infrastructure As Code  etc  Good knowledge of data platforms   deep understanding of concepts like Data Warehouse  Master Data Management  Star Schema  Machine Learning  Strong interpersonal  relationship and management skills with excellent written and verbal communication skills  Track record of innovative solutioning  problem solving and providing guidance to junior employees  We offer Good salary package  one that fits your needs  Flexible working hours and form of employment  Possibility to work 100  remotely  100   paid sick leave with the agreed limits  A great  full of energy and brand new space  Cleeng office  in the very middle of Poznan  Equipment of your choice and additional accessories for your computer to make your work more efficient and comfortable  Perks  private healthcare  sport s card  Multisport   bicycle parking  and partially refunded costs of car parking  Co financed training and conferences  Work with an international team of well rounded experts in Amsterdam  HQ   Poznan  Manilla  NYC  16 nationalities and counting  Work on unique  market leading  SaaS products  with clients all over the world  from New Zealand  Japan  Europe  US  and Latam  Work closely with people who value diversity  hard work  friendly relationships and love their jobs  and get all together to the next level  Languages English Education Master Experience 4  years

 De kans is groot dat ze onze HR oplossingen gebruiken  Visma   Raet is namelijk hofleverancier van software die het leven van HR professionals makkelijker en leuker maakt  We helpen organisaties en automatische kostprijsberekeningen voor projecten en diensten  en het gebruiken van data om onze producten nog beter op de behoeftes van onze klanten aan te sluiten Wat ga je doen  Met jouw kennis van Beschik jij over een brede analytische toolset om modellen en algoritmen te ontwikkelen die informatie uit  on gestructureerde data haalt  Ben jij klaar voor uitdagende projecten waar je analytische oplossingen kunt bouwen met behulp van Phyton  R of SQL  En ben jij gefascineerd door methodieken als Machine Learning  Clustering   Segmentation  Text Mining  Process Mining en Predictive Analytics  Word dan Data Scientist bij Active Professionals   Wat ga je doen  Wanneer je aan projecten werkt voor onze verschillende opdrachtgevers  verbeter je de prestaties van organisaties door op intelligente wijze om te gaan met de data die ze in de loop der jaren hebben verzameld  Je slaat een brug tussen de behoeften van onze klanten en analytische methoden  Vervolgens vertaal je analytische uitkomsten naar duidelijke en begrijpelijke inzichten en adviezen om zo de klanten door het veranderingsproces te leiden   Hierbij hoort  Het identificeren  analyseren en interpreteren van relevante trends of patronen in extreem grote en complexe data sets  Het presenteren van inzichten en verbeterpotentieel aan de verschillende stakeholders  Het ontwerpen  optimaliseren  schalen en automatiseren van analytical workflows  Het bouwen van statistische modellen en algoritmes  Het adviseren over de juiste data en analytics oplossingen   Wat kun je van ons verwachten  Een lekker salaris dat past bij jouw niveau Een leuke auto  vrije keuze binnen jouw budget  Een professionele onderneming die dagelijks stappen vooruit maakt  en dit ook van jou verwacht  Alle mogelijkheden om jezelf te ontplooien met vele trainingen en cursussen  eigen ideeën en suggesties zijn altijd welkom  Directe en korte lijnen met iedereen bij Active Professionals Ontspannen en inspirerende kantooromgeving met een fantastisch uitzicht  extra reden om eens op de koffie te komen  Een bekwaam salesteam dat zorgt voor de leukste en meest uitdagende opdrachten Kom jij onze club versterken job_desc: Wil jij een gave opdracht als Data Engineer bij een opdrachtgever om de hoek  Heb jij passie voor het werken met data en techniek  CloseSure is dé regionale specialist op het gebied van data  Wij zoeken HBO WO geschoolde collega s voor onze vijf vestigingen  Veenendaal  Hengelo  Hoogeveen  Eindhoven en Alphen aan den Rijn    Functieomschrijving  Als Data Engineer van CloseSure ben je op de hoogte van de laatste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van data en de bijbehorende tooling  Deze kennis stelt jou in staat een voortrekkersrol te vervullen in ontwikkeltrajecten bij de klanten van CloseSure  In deze trajecten ben je in staat te adviseren over tooling  architectuur en datamodellering  Naast adviserende vaardigheden ben je technisch onderlegd en implementeer je data pipelines en rapportages  Kortom  je bent een allround data specialist en in staat klanten te ondersteunen bij invulling van de informatiebehoefte   Gevraagd wordt  Jij hebt passie voor het werken met data  Dit betekent dat je nieuwsgierig bent en een onderzoekende geest op datagebied  Jij volgt de laatste ontwikkelingen rondom data en tooling op de voet  Dit doe je door het bijhouden van blogs  vlogs en artikelen op jouw vakgebied  Ook neem je regelmatig actief deel aan Meetups op het gebied van data  Je bent dan ook bekend met de data community binnen Nederland   Je hebt ervaring opgedaan met het implementeren en begeleiden van data oplossingen en met de moderne Big Data  cloud  technieken  Concreet betekent dit dat je ervaring hebt met en brede kennis hebt van één of meerdere tools zoals Microsoft BI suite  Azure  Informatica  Hadoop  Cognos  Tableau  Business Objects of AWS  Het bezitten van een certificering is een pré   Naast deze tooling heb je affiniteit met programmeertalen zoals Java en Python en kan je SQL dromen  Buiten deze technische vaardigheden heb je kennis van en ervaring met datamodelleringstechnieken zoals Kimball  Inmon en Datavault  Ook datawarehouse architecturen en ETL kennen geen geheimen voor jou  Jij overziet het geheel van de totale data architectuur  van bronontsluiting tot rapportage en kunt hierover adviseren   Naast al deze bagage  heb je een flexibele en pragmatische instelling  ondernemende geest en een mindset gericht op het team  Je bent bekend met Agile methodieken zoals DevOps en Scrum en hebt hier ervaring in opgedaan   Herken jij je hierin  Dan heb jij alle benodigdheden om bij CloseSure aan boord te komen   Geïnteresseerd   Neem dan contact op met Diana Rodenburg via youonlyworkonce closesure nl of 06 46 25 02 86
